reviews.title: my son loves this game
reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old because I thought the commercials made it look like a fun game where you can build rollercoasters and run a theme park... which of course it is! But what he's really enjoying is running around 'talking' to the other people visiting the theme parks and getting them to 'like' him. Typically Cody has a very hard time with most Wii games because he's used to using the Playstation or Gamecube controllers which don't require alot of movement. I really never considered this game a teaching game when I bought it but he's having a great time and developing some people skills - it's a win win situation!

reviews.title: not an 'enjoyable' game
reviews.text:
this game really isn't that much different from other 'fighting' games I've seen - aside from the fact that there are lots of 'monsters' to be fighting.

The main thing I didn't like however was that after only 10 minutes of playing my son was so frustrated the controller was spiked off the floor, he's yelling obsenities, and crying.

reviews.title: fun for adults to play wih their kids
reviews.text: My son loved the idea of the Sims games for the computer but never quite got the hang of what buttons to press to get characters do do certain things (when social services came to take away a baby one time it was major trama in our house and I don't believe he's even tried the game since).

reviews.title: perfect device to add a sense of realism to your racing video game
reviews.text:
In any case, I had a great time playing with the wheel and loved the realistic feel as it reacted to whatever was occuring in the game - need I even mention that I'm a TERRIBLE driver! This allowed me a safe venue to get behind the wheel and experience road rage and all the crashes I could desire.

This wheel is very simple to use and looks very realistic so it's a wonderful way to make your racing games feel more intense and enjoyable

reviews.title: love the game BUT....
reviews.text:
If you don't have high speed internet don't bother buying the collector's edition because the extra costumes have to be downloaded from online. We have internet (obviously) but live in a rural area and do not have high speed internet and therefore unable to get the costumes - my husband just contacted the company and got a big fat 'too bad! '.

The bookends are cute and Cody's given them a place of honor holding his other Little Big Planet games. For the price we paid they should have had the costumes on a separate disc or even had the game disk already contain the costumes.

reviews.title: love these headphones, but...
reviews.text: Unfortunately do they not only drown out his yelling at the TV, but they also don't quiet the gaming noise either (I thought all you had to do was plug the device into the proper slot on the HD TV and instant silence, not so). Instead, my husband and son sat there for an hour going through the various ways to turn off the sound on the television and finally found some button on the remote that mutes it. I wear glasses so my ear isn't being pressed down onto the frame (which hurts after awhile). It makes it much easier for him to sneak internet gaming time.

reviews.title: Rude, Crude, Socially Unacceptable ... and a WHOLE LOT OF FUN!
reviews.text: For the rest of you, grab a copy and immerse yourself in hilarity. I'm sure someone else covered the intricate details of the story so I'm not going to bother going there, but I do have to tell you I really enjoyed the way the game makers stayed true to the cartoonish appearance of the characters and scenes. What did surprise me was his reaction when I told him I'd nabbed a copy with the Amazon Vine program.

reviews.title: Fun game but not something you'd play over and over
reviews.text:
Since we live in a rural area and therefore have to make do with satellite internet online play wasn't possible for us, however, he did love just playing it as a single player.
He got a huge kick out of being able to access people's banks accounts and discovering the things they do in their homes (spying on neighbors, fighting, in once case I believe he said that there was a suicide). He did mention that the police are very persistent BUT they don't have boats which he mentions is kind of stupid since it limits the ways they can catch you.

reviews.title: the best pc stereo headphones I've had so far.
reviews.text: the best pc stereo headphones I've had so far. We've tried cordless headphones and they're either really heavy or can't seem to keep a connection so I decided to give the Turtle Beach headphones a try and they're a huge hit! The headphones are comfortable to wear for an extended period of time - and the audio is just right for my needs. Granted I'm not an audio freak and don't worry about base, tones, etc.

reviews.title: great set for Yoshi fans and kids of all ages!
reviews.text: I admit it, I bought this bundle simply for the amibo, but my 18 year old son has played this game over and over since it arrived. He actually told me 'it's just too cute of a game to get angry at' - this from a kid who thrives on first person shooter games. I have to agree with him, the game is super cute and a lot of fun to play... and I love the way the game creators make it a fun challenge to find certain coins so that you can get the different Yoshi's (my personal favorite is Moo, Moo).

reviews.title: great keyboard for gamers who like mechanical keyboards
reviews.text:
I had just bought my son a mechanical keyboard when this one became available on Amazon Vine so grabbed this one for him as well because I thought it looked cool. He has a couple issues he mentioned but overall he said he'd highly recommend it.

cons:
keys aren't flush to the keyboard so hair and other debri can get under the keys.
there's no website information or disk to get the programs necessary to change the colors on the keyboard.

reviews.title: son already thinking of ways to use this prop for cosplay
reviews.text: my son is a huge Gears of War fan so I couldn't resist when I saw this replica available in the Amazon Vine program and I'm so glad I managed to nab one. The prop replica is heavy (just over 10 pounds) and with the exception of the orange safety thing on the end looks pretty real.

reviews.title: great keyboard the gamer in your life will love
reviews.text: my son loves this gaming keyboard. Actually its the first keyboard he's ever had that he honestly has absolutely no complaints with. He even called me all excited because the colors synced up with one of the games he was playing. I'm not going to pretend to fully understand how that works or why but he was sure excited and that made my day.

reviews.title: save your money
reviews.text: son said this game was a complete waste of time. Not sure exactly in what aspect he was referring but he said it missed the mark on so many levels that it's not even worth discussing.

reviews.title: honestly a regular microcard would work just as well
reviews.text: I admit it I liked that it was a Nintendo product so I was thinking some cute Nintendoish character on it or something - not so much. Plus it's hidden once its in the unit anyway so I guess that really wouldn't have mattered. It functions as advertised, but I wanted that little something extra.

reviews.title: great gaming mouse
reviews.text: mouse is comfortable and the cable is very long so you dont have to worry about cable length

reviews.title: a good charging dock for your wireless pro controller
reviews.text: a good charging dock for your wireless pro controller. Nothing fancy which is just what I needed.

reviews.title: Very impressed with Assassin's Creed Odyssey
reviews.text: I never really got into the Assassins Creed games but I have to say that this entry strays away from the way the series has been and is a ton of fun to play. There are many things to do in its world I'd reccomend it to anyone who loves history based games. Really loved that it's so 'involved' that it's a game that you can play over a long period of time and still not be 'done'.

reviews.title: great headset - with a few issues.
reviews.text: The Razer Nari Wireless is a good headset . They feel comfortable on the head and don't cause headaches for me after a hour or two of use. My only real complaint is the mic seems a bit short and the battery seems to die within 4 hours of use and requires charging constantly

reviews.title: Gamer likes it
reviews.text: Got this for my son who is a REALLY big gamer and if he doesn't like something has no problems telling people so, he likes this a lot, stores big and little games and controllers. He said nothing bad about it so I take that for a A+

reviews.title: more friends can play
reviews.text: Pick this up for my gamer son, he loves that 3 friends and himself can play games together. He said use to install.

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.text: These are the best gaming headset I have ever had, so worth it. Very comfortable and clear sound.

reviews.title: used them for meeting
reviews.text: I used the headset for a meeting on my phone. I was able to hear everyone in the meeting, they were comfortable on my ears, wore them about 30 min.

reviews.title: lights up
reviews.text: What fun, love that it lights up. It's a good working mouse, it glides across the mouse pad.

reviews.title: Set is ok. Don't see any problems with it.
reviews.text: Decent value for the money, nothing special! Bought this for my bartop arcade and it works good for it.

reviews.title: Amazing for the price
reviews.text: Work and look amazing! The audio and microphone are both great quality. You can hear very clearly and people can hear you really clearly. For the price point I'm honestly blown away by this set and highly recommend it! Everything works as it should and works flawlessly. Definitely recommend this!

reviews.title: Love love love this! Absolutely beautiful and well made!
reviews.text:
I LOVE how well made this is and it's different color functions! I love to just sit here and play with all of it's color functions and change it up often just for a different look. It's fun seeing the colors wave across the computer and do various things.

It's pretty well made and looks amazing! Absolutely my favorite keyboard I've ever had!

reviews.title: Pretty decent set, works great!
reviews.text:
Everything works as it should and it's a great set for gaming. Is it the highest quality top of the line gaming set? No but it also doesn't have the huge price tag those have. This is mid range set for those who don't want something cheap but don't want to spend several hundred.

The keyboard responds very well in games and so does the mouse. The hub works flawlessly. No huge complaints here.

reviews.title: Really fun game!
reviews.text: Really fun well made game! Have had a lot of fun dancing to this! Very easy to use for all different ages and shapes and sizes of people! Love this!

reviews.title: Love the compact size but maybe it's not for me
reviews.text: If this happens, look down and you'll see the edges of those keys have some excess plastic hanging out, just pop the key caps off and use a knife to trim the extra plastic off. It looks nice and the lights are really cool. This keyboard is just a tad too small and I miss my 10 key and arrows. You can use the letter keys to arrow up, down, and sideways but I can't figure out how to make that work no matter what key combination I use.

reviews.title: A great board game for a good price
reviews.text: This is a really great game. I love the artwork and how vibrant it all is. It comes with lots of tokens and cards which I love. This is not a game for some of my more casual friends, but for those between casual and hard core. Though any smart kid will be able to play this just fine. Pretty quick to play and shouldn't take too long to get the rules down. It's been fun and is a good price for how much you get with it. Definitely a game I'll keep around to play more and I do recommend considering it for your own game table.

reviews.title: Meh. Not my favorite Far Cry.
reviews.text: Not my favorite at all, was just mediocre quality all around. Buggy game and boring.

reviews.title: Great Game Overall
reviews.text: Been into ID since the original Doom. I was quite fearful to get Rage based on a ton of negative feedback. For me, it is running flawlessly. With the exception of the large pricetag and the 35 minute install, it is great. I run a GTX580 and did not even update the drivers per the games own request. Great experience!

reviews.title: GTA 4 Where have you been all my life!
reviews.text:
I have never played or even knew about the GTA series until yesterday! What an awesome game! I purchased the digital download because I could not wait to go buy the CD at a store. The YouTube videos cracked me up!

The 13 gig download took about 2 hours on my 20 meg cable connection. Installation was a breeze and went off without a hook. Went to options and maxed out the video settings (GeForce GTX 580). I started a new game and it has performed remarkably and without error or flaw!

reviews.title: The Al Gore, Geoengineering and Global Warming Game of the century
reviews.text: I enjoy a good sim and especially a city builder. I read some other reviews that kind of compared it to a modern city builder and ummm no! Very unhappy with the result based on other reviews. Seems to have a decent and in depth story line if you can get over the socialist, geo-engineering, uber left and one world crap that is totally embedded within! No joke! This is a sure method the green movement is using to try and sway younger peoples viewpoints and ultimately change this country and world into what they want.

reviews.title: All Good!
reviews.text: Everything was in tact, all codes worked, good!

reviews.title: Great in some ways, not so in others
reviews.text: The foam is soft and it seems a tad lighter. You no longer have a fine tracking experience that is so smooth, as it was in the previous Rift. Your hands in the VR like to twitch, jump and sometimes freeze. For starters, your field of view has reduced and it is not quite as immersive as the previous Rift. For example, it is as though you are looking through toilet paper tubes now, as there are large black areas of nothing surrounding the visual field. Tunnel vision.

reviews.title: Outdated
reviews.text: Was a waste to buy this. It's outdated, unsupported and can no longer use all the features.

reviews.title: Average
reviews.text: This is an ok mouse. The material is on the cheaper side and you can feel it. The mouse wheel is the nicest part of this mouse and is rubberized. The clicks are loud and annoying, but other than that is works.

reviews.title: Great fun!
reviews.text: This is such a cute game! I love the fact you get to play as your pet. I have to admit I do with you got to do more stuff but I still really loved playing this game. I love the Sims so this was just a great game to me.

reviews.title: All in all, amazing guide!
reviews.text: This guide is the bomb! You find out the complete backstory on everyone in this guide and you get some awesome paper crafts in the back! How much more awesome could this guide be! It also gives you the low down of all the different playable characters so you can pick the best one.

reviews.title: Perfect for the Bioshock Fan!
reviews.text: These are my favorite games and I am a huge Bioshock fan so this is right up my alley. The fact I get tons of add on's for each one is just perfect. I also love the free collectible stickers I get for Bioshock Infinite. Just a great thing to have for all Bioshock fans.

reviews.title: Awesome Collectors Set
reviews.text: This turned out to be so awesome! The suitcase is high quality and actually looks like a mini-suit case. It's covered in faux leather and the stamps are actually screen printed on the case and not stickers. I honestly wasn't sure what to expect but I am pleasantly surprised at how amazing it looks. The other stuff is also great quality. The room key reminds me of the ones I have had on vacation before and the hula zombie girl is awesome along with the hand bottle opener, that I won't be using. Just an awesome collector piece that I am very happy to have.

reviews.title: It's not the best but it's still a fun game.
reviews.text: This is a pretty fun game. I was expecting it to look a little better than it does and I was also expecting the moves to be more crisp instead of erratic like they are. I just expected more because it does look like it would be a pretty awesome game. However, despite the problems, I still like the zombie Buffy feel and it's still pretty fun to play and pretty funny too.

reviews.title: Perfect Accessory Kit for the 3DS XL
reviews.text: I bought this to go with my 3DS XL and it has been perfect. I can take my 3DS anywhere now and I don't have to worry about how I am going to charge it or anything like that because everything came with this kit. Also, the case is hard and I am not afraid that something will happen to my 3DS when it is safely inside it because I have dropped it a few times and never a scratch or a bump. Great kit and great price.

reviews.title: Addicting!
reviews.text: All I can say is that this game is addicting! I find myself playing this game all of the time. It's time is set to real life so it can be a draw back because sometimes if you want to do something you have to reset the game clock but it doesn't make me dislike the game. But yeah, this game is hours of fun and just an all around great and addicting game.

reviews.title: Great little system!
reviews.text: I am completely smitten with my DS. I love all of the different games I can play and the other different things I can do on this. I can watch Netflix or Hulu so long as I have a wifi connection. The system itself is great, and I really like the 3D aspect of it, it looks cool and is totally 3D. I also like the size of this DS over the smaller ones because it makes playing games a lot more fun and easier to see some things. I also have to say that I love the pretty pink pearl color it is. I have a case on mine but it is still awesome.

reviews.title: Amazing game, great update!
reviews.text: I loved this game when it was originally for the Xbox and played it all the time. Even at that time I thought everything looked amazing. However, they have made this game amazing again and it looks incredible. Everything looks crisp and sharp and it's just so much fun to play. It's a great game for older children and adults with a great story line and beautiful graphics. In my book, it's a must play for everyone.

reviews.title: Great piece to have in your Fallout collection!
reviews.text: It is freaking awesome and if you are a Fallout fan as much as I am then this is seriously right up your alley. I can't tell you how much I love having my own pipboy because ever since playing Fallout: New Vegas I have wanted one and then going back and playing Fallout 3 made me want one even more, but there is no way in hell I could ever make one myself. You put any smart phone inside this, turn the pipboy app on and boom you can see everything you have on your game, right there in the app on your pipboy. It's pretty awesome!

reviews.title: Great Headset
reviews.text: This is a great communicator headset. It has great sound and I can talk with my friends while playing any game I choose. They are able to hear me really well and the same for me. I love the way it looks and any Titanfall fan will love this headset. I like that it hooks right into my controller and not into the system itself because it makes it much easier to use. Great headset that I like very much.

reviews.title: Totally Bombtastic!
reviews.text: This is an amazing freaking replica! OMG I am totally head over heals in love with this gun, seriously you have no idea. Everything about it is amazing. I am a huge Gears of War fan and this is my gun of choice all the time in the game. This replica does not disappoint in the least. This gun is amazingly detailed from the chainsaw in the front all the way to the sight and trigger. The lights and flashlight work great and just add more to this gun. It's amazing and I couldn't be happier with this replica and it is just totally awesome and worth every penny. Just great!

reviews.title: Sounds Great
reviews.text: Great for any Titanfall fan. It looks great and has great details that I am truly impressed with. It has great sound both in game and in chat. It also feels great over the ear and doesn't start to hurt after a while like many other headphones do. Great communicator that I love using.

reviews.title: Great Edition
reviews.text: Another favorite game in my collection. The Gold Edition comes with all of the dl content that you had to buy separately with the original. Such a fun game that I love playing not only by myself but co-op is just as fun and not bs like other multiplayer games.

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.text: Well, for a generic controller this one works great. It works just like a normal controller from Microsoft, except it costs way less. Has a nice handle feel and works just as it should. Great controller to have as backup or for extra players.

reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Mouse
reviews.text: This mouse is pretty awesome. First off, no more worrying about trying to find stupid batteries cause they are dead and I need my mouse. It's also a silent mouse so when you are clicking around with it, there is no clicking, it's super quiet. The only thing that I am not sure about, is actually how big it is. It's a bit bigger than I am used to and makes it kind of awkward to use but I am getting used to it so it's not that big of a deal but wanted to throw that in there anyway.

reviews.title: Great Series of Games
reviews.text: Borderlands is one of my favorite games and this one is just as good as the others. So much fun to play but even more fun teaming up with others. This version is awesome as it comes with all the DLCs and season pass so that you get all the other stuff they give out over the course of the game. I was also surprised to see this came in a steal book which makes me super happy. Love this game so much.

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.text: Awesome game that I am totally addicted to now. Love the bright colors and graphics are totally epic.

reviews.title: Great Keyboard
reviews.text: Wanted a gaming keyboard for my laptop and this one checks all the boxes for functionality and looks. The lights aren't able to be changed so it stays the constant rainbow but I am totally okay with that. The keyboard works great for gaming and working so I am very happy with it.

reviews.title: Love It
reviews.text: This switch controller is the real deal, it comes with turbo and programmable buttons. I wish I knew how to program the buttons - but hopefully, someone will just make a vid on youtube soon.

reviews.title: Love These
reviews.text: These earbuds are great and I am in love with the sound quality and bass these have. I have not only been using them when I game, where the quality is top-notch and the microphone is crystal clear but I also use them at the gym, which is also great. I am super happy with these and the battery life is great as well. I can do some hardcore gaming sessions and they hold up perfectly. Overall great headphones.

reviews.title: Excellent Value for a One-Handed Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
reviews.text:
RedThunder One-Handed Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is a functional half keyboard with mechanical keys. The website advertised by the production company was mostly not useful as I was unable to find anything of great use and there was a number of translation errors on the physical box [example: "Fast eating chicken stability with many key no conflict reaction"].

Overall, I find RedThunder One-Handed Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is a good product.

reviews.title: Glad to Find This!
reviews.text: I lost my card for some of my PS2 Games. I'm going to go back and play them all over again so I can enjoy the Easter Eggs again that one of my sequel games requires some saves from the previous released game to access. It was not an easy task to find a new PS2 memory card. This was all new and clean, and ready to go for me. I hope you found it helpful and will click the Helpful button below.

reviews.title: Wish I Had this Years Ago!
reviews.text: I've been active using the internet since the 90s, so after many years of regular use of my computer, my wrist is staring to show some wear and tear. I really wish I had the J-Tech Digital Ergonomic Mouse many years ago. It's a much more comfortable position for me. I have smaller hands, and this fits my hand well. I can navigate a page just as quickly, maybe more so than my old mouse. I choose the wired style as that is my personal preference, and the cord is a generous length. Thank you for reading about my experience.

reviews.title: Lots of Storage!
reviews.text: I am pleased with my order of the HEYSTOP 120 Switch Game Case. This holds all the games my kids have for the Switch. This is really great as it's easier to keep the games organized better than the original packaging. It's also a study case that is good for transport. This fits easily into a drawer of our entertainment center. I find this organizer case to be a good value as it's constructed well. I hope you feel my experience is helpful as you kindly click the button below.

reviews.title: Works Well, Cleans Easily
reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with my order of the Studded Grip Skin for Xbox. This arrived in great condition and was not overly packaged. The grip was very easy to slip onto the controller and stays snugly in place. This helps with hand fatigue and also gives a more secure grip when playing with high intensity. I especially like that these grips are easy to clean. We occasionally remove them from the controller and wash them with plain dish soap and water. I find this to be a good value compared to what is available from our local gaming stores. I hope my experience is helpful as you kindly click the button below.

reviews.title: Super Cute for Gamer Girls!
reviews.text: I am very happy with my new EASARS Cat Ear Headphones. These are super cute! They arrived well packaged and in great condition. I'm really happy to have some headphones with mic capabilities that suit my gaming style. These are a fair value compared to similar products, provide a crisp and clear sound quality and are very comfortable to wear for extended gaming sessions. The RGB effects have a smooth transition through the colors as well. I hope my experience with the EASARS Cat Ear Headphones proves to be helpful as you kindly click the button below.

reviews.title: Fantastic Game for All Ages.
reviews.text: Once again LEGO has put out a fantastic game. It's fun seeing all of the Harry Potter characters as LEGOs.

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.text: I love the Elder Scrolls games. If you are a fan also you will love this game. If you are used to the newer game, Skyrim, Oblivion will provide a deeper understanding of Tamriel and the people who live there, and their history. The graphics are much simpler than Skyrim, which greatly improved the look of the places and poeple, but the quests and gameplay are still great.

reviews.title: Three Stars
reviews.text: This game was just okay. The mechanics are a bit difficult to use. I found it quite awkward.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Love this game!

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: One of my favorite games. Love the humor.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Good game.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Great game. One of my favorites.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Love it! A very nice controller.

reviews.title: A Little Known Gem of a Game
reviews.text: A quick view of what the game was like on YouTube and I decided to try it. The story is interesting, and teases you all the way to the end. It has challenging puzzles and the gameplay mechanics are easy to master. Since you play as one type of character (mage, warrior, assassin, etc...) you can play the game more than once using a different skill set each time. If you like Oblivion, Dragon Age or The Witcher, I think you will really enjoy this game as well. There are multi-player online options of play as well, that will further extend your enjoyment of the game.

reviews.title: Recommend
reviews.text: Works great! Easy install to the PC.

reviews.title: Good game, #3 is better.
reviews.text: Risen 3 is easier to play and has a great story. This one is just okay.

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.text: This game is interesting, but clunky game mechanics make gameplay difficult. I also really hate that enemies and stuff doesn't respawn....ever...because it makes it REALLY HARD to earn enough money to get training and buy the equipment you need to keep you alive. Risen 2 and 3 really did a better job at that problem, making gameplay much more enjoyable.

reviews.title: Fantastic! Love this game!
reviews.text: Awesome Game! It is a great addition to the Dragon's Age story. The new combat abilities are awesome! The new health/healing system takes a little getting used to, but with practice I am able to play without dying...much (Of course I'm on casual mode, since I hate dying). The new characters are interesting, the story is compelling, the created world is GORGEOUS! My one complaint is that the boss battles are perhaps a little bit too easy, but that might just because I play in the easiest mode. If you want more challenge, try the harder modes of play.

reviews.title: LOVE Dragons Dogma!
reviews.text: I'm giving this game full stars, because I love Dragons Dogma. It has the best combat play of ANY RPG, in my opinion. The creatures are unmatched in any RPG for realism, creepiness and dreadfulness as opponents. I had been playing the game without the DLC for quite some time. I finally ordered the DLC version and was going to play, but a house fire destroyed my new copy of the game.

reviews.title: Love Hoyle, great games! Wordox Rocks!
reviews.text: I repurchased this game because my previous version got wiped off my hard drive when my husband took stupid windows 10 from my laptop. It works, but worked better with windows 10. With Windows 8, it isn't expanding to full screen, the way I like, but I love this game pack, so I will live with it.

reviews.title: Good game.
reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He doesn't do gaming much, but he enjoyed playing this with our son.

reviews.title: Great Sound - Mic is worthless.
reviews.text: The mic died the day after the Amazon waranty ran out. I contacted Turtle Beach and they said they would send a new mic piece. That was a month ago, and I still have't received it.

reviews.title: Worth it.
reviews.text: Good quality, keeps charge for a long time.

reviews.title: Parially recommend.
reviews.text: The keypad works great. The headset is not worth the money, it is a piece of junk.

reviews.title: Would buy again.
reviews.text: Love the Hoyle Games.

reviews.title: Full Immersion into Tamriel! Couldn't be happier.
reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying my adventures in the Elder Scrolls Online. I am a huge Elder Scrolls fan. This game definitely delivers a satisfying experience as far as being true to the history and lore of Tamriel. The quests are challenging, the stories engaging, the game world is beautiful. There are new mechanics for crafting and the skill/ability builds are different than what you may be used to in say...Oblivion or Skyrim. Crafting has been expanded and it really helps to have friends online to play with, form guilds and share abilities. You can all share the results of your labor to mutual benefit.

reviews.title: Middle of the Pack.
reviews.text: This headset is adequate for the job. The earpiece is fairly comfortable and produces good sound. I like the mic's flexibility. It is easy to manipulate it into a good position. The mic's pickup, however is weak, and I often find my online friends saying that they can't hear me, even though the mic is right next to my mouth, and the volume is all the way up. The headset also slips out of position, which is annoying. It's still better than the basic xbox mic/headset that microsoft sells. I will probably be in the market for a better headset soon. I need an upgrade to this one.

reviews.title: Mixed Feelings. Not quite the quality I've come to expect in Turtle Beach.
reviews.text: I am disappointed with this headset. It is definitely better than the vanilla chat headset the comes with the xBox One, but not as good as my other stereo headset by Turtle Beach. The sound in the ear is pretty good. The part that I'm not as happy with is the mic and the cord. The sound quality of the mic isn't as good as the stereo headset. I've owned this headset for less than 3 months, and the cord has frayed and is breaking at the base of the connector to the controller. I wish the connector was a 90 degree plug-in that I've seen on other headsets.

reviews.title: Simple, but smart.
reviews.text: the 90 degree plug-in is just what I need to keep the cord from crimping.

reviews.title: A must for wireless controllers.
reviews.text: Works perfectly! Fits xbox one console and controllers.

reviews.title: Wondered if this was a real Microsoft product
reviews.text: I had a lot of trouble syncing this controller to my xbox. Got really frustrated, until I finally just plugged it in with the charge cord. That didn't even work, at first, but it finally kicked in and synced up. The other weird thing is the center "x" button in the center. My other controllers have a button that is slightly domed. This one is flat and just feels weird. It is more awkward to press than the domed version. It just made me wonder if this was really a knock-off, instead of the real deal. It is working fine now, though, so I'll keep it.

reviews.title: Uncomfortable
reviews.text: I gave this headset a middle of the road rating. It has some good points...like good sound, nice fabric wrapped cord, easy controls, and the headpiece adjusts easily, but it has some drawbacks as well. One of the most glaring problems is the ear covers. How many people do you know with ROUND ears? Most ears are oval in shape. I think my ears are pretty normal size, but they don't quite fit in the ear cushions. There are only two sound controls, the mute switch (which works fine), and a volume control.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.text: I am mostly a console gamer, but I wanted to play RLCraft, which is only available on PC...for now. Trying to use a keyboard for gaming was a little daunting for me. Too many keys...very confusing. Using the mouse and the keyboard together works great. I'm still pretty clumsy at it, but that's just my learning curve, the equipment works great. Hardcore PC gamers would probably rather use a whole keyboard, and I admit that it would be better, at least for RLCraft. For now though, it works fine and I recommend it, especially for new PC gamers.

reviews.title: Fail!
reviews.text: I tried to play Enderal (a mod for Skyrim) on my laptop. It was horrible. The look sensitivity was WAY off, and no matter what I did, I couldn't adjust it or make it better. Every where I looked the view camera would SWOOP from side-to-side, and up-and down. After a short while, it actually made me feel a bit seasick. I had to disconnect it and plug in my old MIcrosoft made controller. Fantastic! My old controller worked fine and I had no more problems. This is not a real Microsoft product and it shows. It is horrible. Completely unusable. Get the real thing instead.

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.text: Love this cute carry case for the Nintendo Switch. It keeps all the pieces safely tucked away. The hard case means that there is no chance of breakage during transport. Suitable for use while traveling in a car, train, or airplane. I highly recommend.

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.text: This is a great little docking station. It does a great job of charging Switch controllers. It is easy to use, charges quickly and easily, It takes up little counter/table space. I like the way that the controllers can stack. I highly recommend.

reviews.title: Don't like it
reviews.text: My biggest beef with his controller is that the controls in-game are just...swoopy! It doesn't matter how low I turn down the look sensitivity, when you look around it swOOPs left and swOOPs right. There is no feeling of control at all. It's horrible. In game, it gives you the feeling of being on a floating, with no connection to the landscape or spaces. I played Skyrim on it. If I swung around to smack a sabre cat that was attaching me, I would way overswing. Aiming with a bow was nearly impossible. The wacky movement was making me sick to my stomach. Buy the real Microsoft product.

reviews.title: Not as good as the real thing
reviews.text:
I have a horrible problem with this controller. Let me explain.

I play RPG's, like Skyrim, Dragon's Dogma, and Valheim. These off-brand controllers have a real problem getting the look sensitivity right. For a smash and slash sword weilder, this would not be a problem. As I try to aim, the crosshairs swOOOP right and left, up and down, I have no fine control over my aim. It's horrible. Adjusting the look sensitivity does nothing. Pass this up and get a real xBox controller. My old, broken one works better than this one.

reviews.title: Nicest headphones I have ever owned
reviews.text: These headphones are really beautiful. They don't put pressure on your ears or head. The ear cushions are exquisite. The instruction manual wasn't much help. I am a technical dummy. The control has no marks on it. The long was was a volume control. Perhaps the company feels that it's customer base are savvy techies that would appreciate the level of coolness that they are trying to achieve, but that leaves us normals frustrated and struggling to understand how to use their product. If the company reads this review...fyi. Make these easier to use.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.text: This is a very neat little mouse. I really like the way that you can customize it's function and look. I added the weights, because they just felt better that way. Love the pretty lights. Everything functions as expected. I highly recommend it.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.text: This is doing a great job of charging my Xbox One Controllers. The batteries are lasting a really long time, like at least 24 hours. This is easy to use and works great. I do recommend it.

reviews.title: Doens't work
reviews.text: I have followed the instructions, but I can't get this to work. My computer doesn't recognize it, and can't load the driver, so I can't use it. Disappointing.

reviews.title: Worked great...until it didn't
reviews.text: When I first got this, I loved it. It worked great and felt almost as good as my real xBox controller. But, only a few weeks after I got it, it went wonky. All of the sudden, the controls didn't work. They just quit working. I pushed buttons, nothing happened. Pulled triggers, characters in the game walked around in circles and I couldn't steer them. The controller was useless, and I chucked it in the trash where it belongs. Don't buy this. It is a waste of money.

reviews.title: Great game for everyone
reviews.text: This is a great game. I have three young children and it can be very difficult to get the kids moving, especially as it enters the winter months. This is a great way for the kids to get some physical activity. Most people thing of video games as a very sedentary activity, but this is a way for kids to get some great physical activity. It is also great for the adults, too. It is a lot of fun, and has many great songs. The combination of sound and video make it a lot of fun. It is also great for parties.

reviews.title: Good quality headset
reviews.text: Overall I was very happy with these headphones. The sound quality was very good. They look very nice. They felt very durable and of high quality. My only issue is that the mute button is the same as the power button and gives no indicator the user can see. You might try to put it on mute and not and there would be no way for you to know. Also, if you hold the mute button accidentally you'll turn the entire headset off. Still, the positives far outweighed the negatives in this set, and I'd highly recommend it.

reviews.title: This keyboard has a nice look. I like the red lights
reviews.text:
This keyboard has a nice look. I like the red lights. Each key has an individual light. There's no mechanical click to the keys, which I would prefer.

I like that you can switch out the keys. That was very easy to do. The entire keyboard was pretty easy to set up. I found that it worked well with gaming, better than our standard keyboard.

I really like the USB Pass-through-port. This was a nice advantage.

Overall, I am happy with this keyboard.

reviews.title: Great wheel
reviews.text: We are really happy with this wheel. I don't let them ride real go carts or anything dangerous, so this is a wonderful way to get that authentic feel from our living room. It gives them the same feeling of being at an arcade right from our home. I was at first concerned about the negative reviews, but after looking through them, I realize that most of them are a reflection of the company practices and not this actual wheel. The wheel is very responsive and works great. What a difference from the normal video game controllers and other wheels we have used. I like that the brake is separate. The force feedback is really realistic.

reviews.title: Outstanding keyboard
reviews.text:
This is an outstanding keyboard. You only have... 16.8 MILLION colors to choose from so I think most people will find this sufficient. It has a great look. It was also not difficult to change the colors, which I like.

I loved all the shortcut and customizable keys. I can control my media easily with built in shortcut keys for for things like play, pause and volume. It was pretty smooth and quiet. It's quality and features also make it perfect for home or office use. It felt extremely durable.

reviews.title: Great keyboard
reviews.text:
It worked out perfectly for me to get this keyboard right when my son spilled lemonade on my old one. Both were Logitech, and I am very happy with this new one. I like the full size keyboard with the number pad - for me that is a must. It is very comfortable to press the keys. I am a writer and type very fast so I need something that is comfortable and works well.

I like the customization keys that this has. It was simple to set up and use. When I first got a lit keyboard I never wanted to go back.

reviews.title: Nice keyboard
reviews.text:
This is a very nice keyboard. I really like the blue illumination. After starting with an illuminated keyboard I would never go back to a plain one again. I thought it was very responsive. It really allows for a lot more customization that other keyboards.

The anti-ghosting is a great feature. It was very intuitive.

It was not as loud as a lot of the other mechanical keyboards, which I appreciated. This would be especially important if you are near someone else.

I am very pleased with this keyboard and would recommend it.

reviews.title: These headsets are comfortable and they sound good
reviews.text: These headsets are comfortable and they sound good, but the mic quality isn't great. I have $300 headphones, these aren't that level, but they definitely beat the $100 headphones I have and with the mic integrated they are a pretty good deal. But the mic quality is about the same as a $10 cheap mic on its own and that's a problem if you are in a situation where audio quality matters.

reviews.title: Cool Colors And A Fast Response Time
reviews.text: This is a pretty neat mouse. I have an RGB keyboard on my MSI laptop with similar color control software, so it's great to have a mouse that matches. It doesn't have as many buttons as my other mice, but for gaming I have a custom keyboard that does all that and more. But overall it works great. Fast response, easy to click, and it looks great, what more can you ask for (other than a few more buttons)?

reviews.title: Great storage system
reviews.text: Great storage system. I've used a few in the past that only held 6 or 12, this is far better. Finally, a design that works.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Great mouse pad for gaming or just general use. The surface doesn't irritate my wrist when moving around!

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: I love the colors... The keys are easy to press and the response time is fast for gaming too!

reviews.title: A Good Basic Mouse
reviews.text: I prefer my G60 for gaming, but for a low-cost mouse to use on my regular computer, this one does everything I need!

reviews.title: Fits Right
reviews.text: This fits correctly and it isn't too shiny so I can use it outdoors still. Perfect!

reviews.title: A Good Basic Case
reviews.text: This case does a good job of stopping scuffs and also carries a few accessories. Overall, it works well!

reviews.title: A Fine Set Of Games For Young Kids
reviews.text: This is a good set if you have young kids. I don't want violent games, which is why I stick with Nintendo where not every game is about killing people! But I will say that these are not meant for adults, they held my attention for like 5 minutes.

reviews.title: Do You Love Gameshows?
reviews.text: On tablets, these games often end up having ads, or charging money to play after a time. This version is not ad-supported, and the colors and sharpness of the display make the Switch the best platform for the games!

reviews.title: Great Controller
reviews.text: If you want to add a wired controller to your switch, this is the way to go!

reviews.title: Looks Sleek
reviews.text: This looks sleek and it performs well too.

reviews.title: Pleased with Mouse
reviews.text:
I really liked this mouse. It was very responsive. It seemed to be very good quality. It worked very well.

It had a very nice look to it. It was very attractive.

I liked all of the buttons and pre-programming options. I like that it has seven buttons and the wheel works fine. It makes it easier to use, whether you are using it for gaming or for just everyday use.

It was comfortable to use. It was easy.

I would recommend it.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.text: This cable (with an appropriate charger) powers the switch faster than it uses power (so if you plug in and start playing, the battery will still charge up). NOTE:  To do this, you need a good charger. I've got about a dozen battery packs, and only one of them will supply this much power! That one is an Anker, but then again, so are 4 others that don't work. The PowerCore 20,000 is the one that works, but Anker has made several versions of this and I own two and the other doesn't work. So I guess what I'm saying is "good luck!"

reviews.title: Nice keyboard

reviews.title: Great For Windows or Raspbery Pi!
reviews.text: I've got both Windows games and a Retro Pi system. This works with both, which is why I got it. It's a good size and feel, and it works quite well. It is responsive too. I'm happy with this purchase!

reviews.title: RetroPi In A Hurry!
reviews.text: No need to set up the OS yourself, this card comes preloaded with the best gaming system you can get for under $100 including everything but the TV!

reviews.title: Good For Homebuilt Arcades!
reviews.text: This is a great stick if you want to build your own arcade games cabinet! It works well and it is easy to build into your projects. The buttons work great and sound perfect. I'm happy with it!

reviews.title: Really Big
reviews.text: This is a really big keyboard for it's size. Much thicker than expected, and heavier. There are a number of keyboards on the market that are the width and height, but 1/3 the thickness and 1/5 the weight.

reviews.title: Pretty Good Mouse
reviews.text: This is a decent mouse. The movement is responsive, and the weight is good. It doesn't have as many buttons as I would like, but it is a good size for traveling and I like it.

reviews.title: Really Nice Keyboard
reviews.text: This is a great travel keyboard. It supports 3 Bluetooth connections, so you can quickly switch between your phone, tablet and computer (or whatever). There is also a dongle if you need that option. The keys make a satisfying click, but not a loud one.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.text: Works great, brought back a lot of memories

reviews.title: Three Stars
reviews.text: Works great, fans make a loud noise for a minutes

reviews.title: Four Stars
reviews.text: Daughter loves this game

reviews.title: Cant hear game play
reviews.text: Cant hear game play through headset, only chat seems to work.

reviews.title: Works with Nintendo Switch!
reviews.text:
The end effect of turning on virtual 7.1 surround sound is that the soundtrack is more "atmospheric" or "wider" sounding, but you wouldn't be able to tell that a sound is coming from your rear left flank. Honestly, I don't like extra processing to my audio signals. Even the volume buttons on the headset works!

My overall experience with Spirit Wolf has been positive. The options were stereo, 5.1, 7.1, and spatial sound. The sounds simulate a wide environment and I was able to distinguish the direction of each distinct sound source. Very impressive.

reviews.title: joy-cons fit a little too tightly and charging status indication could be better
reviews.text:
Most manufacturers mold textures into the plastic to give them grip. My past experience with satin surfaces is that after a few years, they become a sticky mess.
-- Perhaps it is the product that I got but I charged the grip overnight without the joycons inserted and the red charging light was still on when I checked on it in the morning so there is no indication that the charging has completed. A blue light indicates that the controllers are charging.
-- Not much heavier than the original switch grip.
-- Wider than the original grip.

reviews.title: A must-have accessory for the switch;  This is not an exaggeration.
reviews.text: Power adaptor designers have taken safety more seriously and personally, I have been able to use multiple docks and hubs with the Switch with no issues. When travelling, it is usually necessary to pack the official Nintendo Switch charger for power. In a normal case, one must add the large Switch dock in addition to an HDMI cable in order to play in docked mode while on travel. This charger allows one to leave the large dock at home.

reviews.title: My complaints may be down to personal preference...
reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:a4d91a6fb11c550cd582ff40a0fe7596]] The Logitech G733 K/DA Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Headset is a League of Legends themed headset with a great design and colorful, but unintrusive LEDs. It also sports a suspension style headband. The sound is clear and crisp with a good range, but not a booming bass (which I don't mind. Compared to my wired headset, the SADES Spirit Wolf, the sound profile of the Logitech G733 is much smaller as opposed to the large hall feel of the SADES.

Personally, I prefer the large, open feel of the SADES to the smaller close-up feel of the Logitech.

reviews.title: It seems like this is all you would need for your Oculus Quest 2, but...
reviews.text: The head strap is much more comfortable and secure than the original oculus. The eye piece is MUCH better than the original cloth as sweat is easily wiped off (Facebook is currently addressing this issue and the Oculus will now come with silicone eye pieces). The out-of-the box experience with the Oculus leaves much to be desired and accessories are just a fact of life. Just as purchasing a case for a phone or tablet is just part of the cost of the device.

reviews.title: Great nose piece but headband needs work.
reviews.text: This X-super Home product for the Oculus Quest 2 comes with a headstrap and silicone face cover. In practice, the battery makes the entire setup too heavy and reintroduces the problem of the goggles swinging around when turning your head. Compare this to the silicone cover that Facebook sent as part of their recall, the Facebook cover is smooth and doesn't have a flap at all to cover the bridge of the nose.

reviews.title: A good idea
reviews.text:
The basic idea is that most people need a grip when using the switch controllers anyway. Add some batteries in that grip and you can extend your play time. It's quite obvious when you think about it.

In practice, these grips feel good. They add more surface area to the controller than the ones that come from Nintendo, making it more comfortable to hold for people with larger hands.

reviews.title: No need for a fancy dock.
reviews.text:
It comes with two rechargeable batteries and special battery covers that expose a magnetic charging port on the side of the controller. It also comes with a magnetic type-c connector for your goggles.

By cutting a small hole in the silicone sleeve, I'm able to charge the controllers without removing the sleeve and the cables are easy to connect because of the magnetic connectors. The second problem is that the three devices will be sharing a single cable and thus, sharing the available amps. I don't have long play sessions with the VR system so I'm not so worried about charging speed.

reviews.title: Smaller than I expected, but still useable.
reviews.text:
There are many third-party switch controllers on the market and each make claims about compatibility or useability. The entire controller feels soft and satin with nice analog sticks that don't feel loose. The buttons feel good and the digital pad is fairly standard.

Outside of these basic features, the controller has two programmable buttons in the back and turbo mode for all of the face and shoulder buttons. The programmable buttons actually can remember fairly long sequences of button presses and digital pad inputs.

reviews.title: I've been looking for an affordable headset with surround.  This fit my needs.
reviews.text:
It had large speakers that gave the sound a "roomy" feeling, especially when paired with the driver software that it came with, but the wire was driving me crazy. I've come across many in the 30-dollar range but none of the descriptions for those touted surround sound. I'd been playing Uncharted 4 on my PC with my old pair of headphones and it sounded great. The game automatically detected the headset and showed that it was using virtual surround. I was super impressed!

I then disconnected the dongle and tried the headset in bluetooth mode.

reviews.title: I switch-ified my XBox One controller
reviews.text:
After a couple of years of intense gaming on my XBox One controller, the rubber on my left analog stick pretty much rubbed smooth, losing grip. I bought the TOMSIN Replacement Joysticks for Xbox One Series X/S Controller in the Nintendo Switch blue/red combo.

The installation was straightforward. Just followed a teardown video on youtube and used the included tools. The tools came in handy to pry the plastic open and unscrew the screws holding the controller together.

Replacement was simple. Just pull off the old analog sticks and pop in the new ones. Great product.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.text: Great card! Worked well! You buy this card so your kids can play online or be online with the Xbox! I am very happy with this purchase!

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.text: My son loves this game!! I think it is a great game and makes kids think! All 4 of my kis ages 5-9 love it!! I would definitely purchase again all my kids love minecraft! Even the older ones 14-17!! I am a very happy customer!

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.text: Kids love the game! They are ages 5-14! Appropriate for age group! They really enjoy playing!

reviews.title: Makes wonderful gift!
reviews.text: Awesome game great for all ages ! My kids are 5-14 and they all love it! I would definitely recommend! Great present ! I am very satisfied with this purchase!

reviews.title: One disk for all the Halos! Awesome!
reviews.text: We love Halo! Having all in one disk is wonderful! Very happy with this purchase! Great price!

reviews.title: Wonderful Game System!
reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this! They received it for Christmas and we are very happy with it! It has wonderful graphics! I am very happy with this purchase! We have 6-7 kids use it a day and it has really held up! Even my 5 year old has figured it out and loves it! I would definetly recommend to any one looking for a game system! Plus it comes with all the Halos,except 5,so they will have more than one game to play!

reviews.title: My kids love it
reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this game! It comes with a code to get fallout 3 for free!! What a great deal! My kids have not quit playing this!

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.text: My kids love this video game! They have played for hours! They are very happy with this game!

reviews.title: Decent HARD case for travel - charging a bit of a trick when in case.
reviews.text:
Many Nintendo Switch cases have hit the market since the release of the versatile gaming system and this this one meets all of the critical criteria of a good case but falls a bit short in order to be considered great.

The Switch fits perfectly in the top with adequate padding to protect the critical top glass LED screen.

reviews.title: AMAZING KEYBOARD to WORK ON
reviews.text:
By designing the keyboard with a curve and having the keys at slightly different levels I’ve found that my hands become less strained when typing all day.

The clicks of the keyboard give both a tactile and auditory response when the keys are depressed allowing the user to know the key has been depressed. It allows for the colors of the keys to be changed in all sorts of patterns and designs to suit your particular tastes. In addition there are LED light strips on both sides that can be adjusted.

This is an all around incredible keyboard that is a joy to work on.

reviews.title: Awesome Wireless Mouse
reviews.text: This mouse makes use of the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology making connections dependable and consistent. While most similar products mean replacing batteries and locating a new one when the old dies- this one has a powerful battery built within it. The mouse sleeps when not in use preserving the battery and reawakens immediately, in addition there is a power switch for when work is completed. I have found this mouse fits perfectly within my palm without over extension of my wrist. It utilizes the latest technology for outstanding performance and durability.

reviews.title: More Accurately Described as a Workstation Pad - Flickers in Scrolling Mode
reviews.text:
This is certainly not a failing of the product, only my experience.

I have ended up using this beneath my PC and server on the table next to my recliner and it looks great while providing a soft surface for my computer equipment to rest.

While this does not come with a micro USB cable I always have additional so this wasn’t an issue but should be known. This is not an issue in the breathing color changing modes but, for me, makes the scrolling modes unusable.

reviews.title: Better than my other devices!
reviews.text: I love wireless VR but the benefit of this is you will never run out of battery charge as it don’t use batteries. Tidbit all VR are designed to have the sharpest part of the image towards the center as that’s how human vision works we see in a 120 degrees arc.

reviews.title: NOT good sound quality seems it was designed by fish men underwater.
reviews.text: The controller itself is okay as to play with but sound is like a tin can even with high quality headphones attached and makes the game sound like dollar tree headphones.

reviews.title: Like a glove
reviews.text: Not good to use in standby mode because it will trick the unit to believe it’s still on your head going out of sleep mode and drain your battery. Otherwise turn it off and then put the protector on the lens. Also good if you need to quickly put down the headset you can  put the protector in the headset briefly to go afk and have your lenses protected. Great to keep your lenses safe from scratching or to keep other object from knocking against or coming into contact with the lenses ruining them.

reviews.title: Good Halo
reviews.text:
This is a good Halo type strap. Nothing to complain about so far so good.
Nice fit, takes pressure away from face.

reviews.title: Good strap!
reviews.text: Better than I expected and actually better than my Halo Strap. I added these extra accessories and I’m loving it.

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.text: Great product. I have not killed the battery yet and I've played 18 hours straight on saturday. Only thing I don't like is the light. Its really bright and flashes on n off. Other than great totally worth the money

reviews.title: Must have item
reviews.text:
One my first ALL 5 STAR.
I AM very impressed. Wasnt sure what to expect but wow.
VERY sturdy, holds position with no lag.
Made solid metal not breakable at all.
This is a must have for phones or nintendo switch.
Glad I bought this 100%

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.text: Very nice case and all. Glad I spent the money. Very happy with purchase and so will you.

reviews.title: Must have controller, best one in 30 years I swear by it
reviews.text:
Very rare 5 star review

UPDATE:
After 3 months of use (soild use, everyday).
This has been the BEST controller I've ever bought from ANY system in my 30 years of gaming. Its durable as hell and holds up great. Buttons and stick still works like perfect. This controller is FKIN amazing.. the smoothness the control and feel of buttons and the controller itself.in your hands is like holding liquid gold. I see alot of review complaining about left stick after a short time...

reviews.title: There are cheaper versions they all work the same.
reviews.text:
It works. I often wonder why I didnt go buy 2 64gb cards for 21$. Because it wouldve saved me 12$. But I was cautious of using a non nintendo product for various reason so I spent the extra money.

It reads fast it writes fast and I can stop archiving my games now. Plenty of room for what I need.

reviews.title: Muat buy for building lovers.
reviews.text:
I lobe this game. I'm a huge minecraft fan with over 1k hrs on 2 systems, but builders 2 has everything u wish minecraft did (without mods). The story is ok to progress through game kinda childish but that's what I would expect. It's a great builder game without having to collect so many resources to do so.
A must buy in my book

reviews.title: Dont buy get builders 2 instead.
reviews.text:
This game was good thought but builders 2 is way way better.
The story is ok but over all game play I just didnt like it. If ur going to buy a buolder game skip 1 and just get #2 you wont be disappointed.

reviews.title: Come a long way
reviews.text:
Boy these games have come a long way since the original Zelda games came out. I found a couple of the movements for the controller had a little bit of a learning curve, but it didn't take me too long to learn. This game is almost like watching a movie. The characters are really well developed and look much more realistic than in previous games. I love the world that was created in this game. The water and trees and other surroundings make you feel like you are really there.

I would recommend this game to older kids and teens/adults. Great game.

reviews.title: Endless joy for the ocean lover
reviews.text: This game is amazing. I have no experience with the first Endless Ocean game so I can't compare, but I absolutely love this one. This game is such an adventure that you tend to forget about everything else around you. I love that you get to interact and "heal" the marine creatures. Filling the aquarium tanks is also really fun. I would recommend this game for anyone old enough to understand the basic commands of a Wii remote. This is so much fun, but I warn you, it can become quite addictive.

reviews.title: Really? the PS1 game was better!
reviews.text: I absolutely love the Spyro games. That being said, one of my favorite things about the original Playstation Spyro games was the ability to have a little free roaming ability. I loved chasing the sheep and getting the little dragon into trouble. This game doesn't give you that option. You can't go too far out of bounds or it just resets you to where you are "supposed" to be. I was finishing this game at a ridiculous rate without even having to try. The controls are not complicated and fun like the old games. In my opinion, this one isn't worth the money or the time.

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.text:
There are multiple levels and many different species of fish to find. They vary in weight and there are special fish in each lake. On a big screen this looks crazy cool!

The kids enjoyed using the fishing pole after they got the hang of it and didn't have any further trouble with it. They liked doing the challenges and felt like kings of the fishing arena when they pulled in a big one. I'd recommend this game to anyone who likes a pretty realistic fishing experience.

reviews.title: hmmm
reviews.text:
The controls in this game are somewhat ridiculous. I actually think you might fare better if you just randomly push buttons and hope for the best. I thought the graphics were okay, and the overall story was expected, but the game controls just ruined it for me. After ten minutes I felt like I had arthritis.

The kids have no idea what does what, but they enjoy trying to beat up the bad guys anyway. If you can get it really cheap it might be worth it.

reviews.title: Just fun no matter what age you are
reviews.text: This game has a huge selection of vehicles and customization options. The courses are really life-like and there are a lot of different challenges for you to complete in order to reach the top of the ranks and unlock the next level. My kids and I had fun with this game for hours, and I think anyone would enjoy the arcade feel to this game. This reminded me of being a kid playing some of the first racing games, except of course this had better graphics. I love it.

reviews.title: I'll get you yet feather brain!
reviews.text: So, this game is really cute. There were a lot of things to like about it. The characters are silly and funny and the game has a lot of funny sound effects and animations. The chickens made my kids laugh and they had a good time with it for a little while. The main reason for the three star rating, was that the first level was difficult to get past and so they kept doing it again and again until they tired of it. Since they couldn't get past that level, they soon grew frustrated. It wasn't bad, but I think for my seven and eight year old children it was a little too difficult.

reviews.title: Fun and cute
reviews.text: I bought this for my pre-teen sons and they have been having a really good time with it. They said it was harder than they thought it would be, but that it has loads of characters to unlock and the graphics are really good so they like it a lot. I watched them play it for a while and it looks like fun. I didn't see anything that should concern parents while watching it, the characters are cute. This was a good buy and lots of hours of entertainment for the price. I'm happy we got it.

reviews.title: different....
reviews.text: I usually love the Samurai and Dynasty Warriors games, but this one really threw me. I wasn't sure what to think about the first person action, it was strange compared to the other games. The gameplay isn't too bad and the controls for the Wii aren't that difficult to figure out, but I didn't like it nearly as much as I thought I might. It isn't bad as a budget game, but I wouldn't choose it as a favourite.

reviews.title: Good for younger kids
reviews.text:
I bought this looking for an inexpensive game system for younger players that doesn't require DVD type disks and am happy so far with what this does. With the games already programmed in, it makes it easy for the parent. There is a decent selection of less complex games for younger kids and it comes with two controllers so two player games are no problem. I'm happy with it.

There is a pretty versatile selection of games with this system, even including some Sonic games. Not a bad deal for paying less new for this one than some systems cost used after many years.

reviews.title: Improvement over the first
reviews.text:
I liked this game much better than the original version because there isn't so much running around lost inside the castle. There is a decent selection of characters you can play as and the scenery in the background is varied with the graphics being slightly better quality than in the previous game.

The weapon and items screen is easier to get through and doesn't take up as much time so you can get to actually hacking and slashing sooner. I'm happy with it and my older kids and I are having a good time exploring this game together.

reviews.title: Good slashing fun!
reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun and has a good cast of characters to choose from, even in first player mode. I like the story behind the game and the final battle is difficult even when you are playing with the game set on easy. I liked the way the weapons level up and the selection screens are a breeze to get through. This is pretty fun and worth the money for anyone who loves hack and slash games.

reviews.title: gone fishing...again
reviews.text: I didn't find that this game is as complex as the first one, there just isn't as much going on. Yes, you have to gather things to build stuff and aid in your survival, but there are often times when there just isn't much to do. If trying to catch fish to keep yourself from starving to death isn't your thing, you might want to rethink this game. Overall, it isn't bad, but I still prefer the original game to this one.

reviews.title: so much fun
reviews.text:
The graphics are really good in it, the tracks are varied and I felt like the story made more sense and was a nice. solid reason to want to put some effort into winning races and taking over territories.

There is a wide selection of cars to choose from after you start unlocking them and even the two player mode on this game is a lot of fun. I liked the characters and the way you can jump from one event to another by using the world map. The canyon races are challenging but still fun and the other modes keep it interesting. Love those right angle turns and shortcuts!

reviews.title: not quite part of the 'family'
reviews.text:
Yes, they may have used the Corleone name and there may be some characters from the books and films represented in this game, but you aren't playing as Michael or anyone else important, just a random street grunt looking to move up and become a member of 'the Family." La Cosa Nostra? I think not.

While the game can be fun at times, there is also a lot of pointless running around on foot and stealing cars that look like something out of a bumper car lot at a local carnival. Nope.

reviews.title: easy controls and fun chases
reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun and is one of the better need for speed titles for ps2, in my opinion. I liked the different tracks and the cop chases in this game are a lot of fun. There are plenty of shortcuts to be taken on these tracks and the cops are determined to get you, so it is a challenge to get away from them, which makes it so much more interesting. The story isn't bad and the other characters don't interrupt you every five minutes, so you actually get to play more than just sit and wait. I liked it.

reviews.title: it wasn't bad
reviews.text: As far as games go, this is a decent racing game. There is a good selection of cars to choose from and some interesting tracks. I didn't love all the interruptions that the story causes in the beginning that keep you from getting to the actual racing and the way the world map works in this game is kind of annoying at times. You spend a lot of time driving from one location to another and back to the garage. The graphics aren't bad and the races are interesting and varied with drag, drift, circuit and other things to do. Not the best of the need for speed games IMO, but still fun.

reviews.title: meh. Funny but not complicated.
reviews.text: I expected the graphics in this game to be a bit cheesy and they are, so that was no real surprise. What the characters say is funny, the different modes allow you to have fun in different ways and two player mode is crazy, where you can steal passengers fro the other players. Still, I don't love the main one player mode because it feels too individual and not like you are really accomplishing anything since you have to choose a new character and car again after the end of every one.

reviews.title: worth the money to have fun
reviews.text: Graphics are pretty good in this game and there are some pretty funny moments. The gameplay is good and the controls are not hard to figure out. This is one of the better movie based games that I've played recently. The battles are epic and there are some challenging aspects to this game, so it will keep you busy for a while for the $$ you spend on it. I am impressed, overall, by the quality of this game and the way the characters were designed.

reviews.title: Not what I thought but okay
reviews.text: Meh...not sure I love the idea of killing off characters that I love in order to progress in this game and some of the controls are a bit wonky. It is kind of fun in some parts and allows you to build up your characters, but it isn't as good as some of the other Star Wars games, IMO. It takes a while to figure everything out though, so if you want something to keep you busy for a bit, this will do it.

reviews.title: Good monkey fun
reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun. I liked that you can either be king kong or be the guys, both are fun. The graphics are decent and the game controls aren't that difficult to figure out and remember how to use, even if you don't play it again for a while. My older boys are having a great time with this game.

reviews.title: fun for the parents, too!
reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun and will keep you on your toes. I like the graphics and the story is interesting as well. The controls aren't that hard and the surprises just keep coming with every new thing you have to do. My twelve and thirteen year old boys are having fun trying to beat this game and it has proved to be fun for the parents as well. I also like it because it seems like it will take a while to get past all of it, so it should be hours of fun for the price. A good buy.

reviews.title: Different, but fun
reviews.text: This is a lot different from the original Tetris game, but it has some fun modes and once you get past the little learning curve it is pretty fun to play. The rules aren't complicated and most of the levels are pretty easy, so this is good even for younger children who don't have a lot of gaming experience. Overall it is a fun game with a lot going for it.

reviews.title: Complicated but fun
reviews.text: There are a lot of complicated button combos in this game and it took me and my kids a while to get the hang of things, but once we did, we had a good time with this game. There is a good selection of characters unlocked in the very beginning, so you don't have to be someone unknown to start with and the different match styles and events as well as arenas are fun. This is one of the better wrestling games in my opinion.

reviews.title: We enjoyed busting out
reviews.text: I like the fact that you can play two player mode in this game in the main mode, although doing so does create some interesting complications as you get farther into the game. The graphics aren't bad for being a ps2 game and the controls are basically the same as the previous sims game, so there isn't a huge learning curve to get over before you begin playing. Some of the story lines it comes up with and missions you have to complete are quite funny. Overall, this game is enjoyable and will keep you busy for many hours.

reviews.title: Love the multiplayer modes
reviews.text:
The graphics are kind of blocky---yes, I realise it is old...but otherwise this is really great. I think this Need for Speed has the best multiplayer mode of any of the games, allowing you to do more than just simply race one another. I like the different modes in this game in single player as well.

This is fun and perfectly appropriate for younger kids, as there is nothing in it that is inappropriate for their age group. Overall, this is one of my favourite racing games and was a good addition to our library of Need for Speed games.

reviews.title: Too fun!
reviews.text: Okay, so we may have burnt down our Sim house a few times and killed a few gnomes before we got the hang of it, but once we did, this game is really great. I will warn anyone who hasn't played it that it can become a bit addicting :) I had fun with the single player mode, but also with building a neighborhood and the kids loved it as well. If you are looking for a game that will keep you playing for a long time, this one should do the trick.

reviews.title: really different than most slot games, and fun
reviews.text: I thought this game was a lot of fun. Rather than just being a basic slot game, there are quests to follow and it has more of an organised story to it. I liked the games that are included with it and found myself lost in them without even realising how long I had been playing A lot of fun for an outstanding price. Recommended to those who enjoy slot games with a bit of a twist.

reviews.title: There's some good and some bad
reviews.text: This second incarnation still has adorable characters and much of the original functionality that the first had. With the first game, you might be lucky if you served a handful of successful dishes and earned a couple of hundred points before the timer ran out. With the second game, you can easily earn more than a thousand points with hardly any effort. The things that made the first game challenging and fun were the rocking boats, the slippery ice and stuff like that. The emote icons are a pointless addition that does nothing to enhance the gameplay experience and don't work as well as they should. Overall, I thought this game was a massive disappointment.

reviews.title: You had better have a decent internet connection
reviews.text:
There is a 38 gig patch that has to be downloaded before you can play the full game and if you have a slow internet connection or serious restrictions on the amount of gigs you can use, you will be in trouble with this.

Needless to say, I wasn't pleased that Activision decided to release this disk as is when they could have put so much more of the game on the disk.

reviews.title: Great for 2ds as well
reviews.text: This was a gift for my son for Christmas. Not only was I pleased with it because it is well-made, and it looks just like the picture, but it also works perfectly to hold a 2ds. Unlike some of the themed items I have purchased before, this one really does look like the character it is supposed to portray. Overall, this is a very cute product that is also functional and I am quite happy with it.

reviews.title: I finally understand what all the hype was about
reviews.text:
I love just about everything about this game system--except that the remote require actual batteries and does not come as a standard rechargeable.
