reviews.title: Nancy Drew : The Cinderella Years
reviews.text: I love Nancy Drew and I was really excited about sharing this with my son, but this really misses the mark. There's very little sleuthing and far too much patronizing housework.

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is a big fan of the books. We've really enjoyed this game. It captures the spirit of the books and adds in a little whimsical activities to go along with the puzzles.

reviews.title: Super cute
reviews.text: I have a hard time finding games that are non violent,  but still hold my 11 year old son's attention. This one fits the bill quite well. The graphics are bright and the game play is not overly complicated.

reviews.title: No, apparently I'm not smarter than a fifth grader.
reviews.text: I bought this for my fourth grader and he has really enjoyed it. I'm almost ashamed to admit that it has stumped me a time or two. It's rather educational,  but also a lot of fun.

reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:f4ae83ce2efd4be492a6b5575511803]] I bought this for my son's Xbox system. He likes to take it with him to his grandparents house on the weekends and needed a way to carry it easily. It's lightweight,  but sturdy. It protects his game as well as holds it. It has places specifically made for his game controllers so they don't bump into anything and get damaged. It has a detachable shoulder strap and a handle to carry it with. It even has room for a few games.

reviews.title: The perfect size for a Playstation 5
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:7c000fde63fd3acfde2a8aca7d85126d]] I bought this for my sister who recently moved. She wanted a way to pack her son's game system that would help protect it. It's very easy to use and it's the perfect size. It has places for 2 controllers so they are protected and won't get scratched up. It has pockets for games and a nice handle with a comfortable grip. It also comes with a detachable shoulder strap.

reviews.title: No more lost games
reviews.text: Maybe I'm just old, but I have a hard time keeping up with the kid's switch games because they are so darn small. This is a great idea because it holds a ton of games and keeps them safe. We can even organize them based on what type of game it is. There are several slots for the cartridges and it all zips up neatly.

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.text: I bought these for my son to use while gaming. I must admit that I am a bit of a technophobe so I don't really have a lot of experience with electronics. Thankfully,  these are very user friendly. The process of connecting them to the Bluetooth was very simple. Now it automatically connects when it is turned on. The battery life is great and it doesn't take too long to charge.

reviews.title: Really cool
reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is really into gaming right now. I don't know anything about technology,  but they were very easy to install. He loves the back light options. There are three different settings and you can also the brightness. It's just so fun and colorful. The set also includes a gaming mouse. It lights up too and it is very user friendly. It moves well and feels comfortable in his hand.

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.text: I bought this for my son who loves to play video games. He is on the autism spectrum so he has a lot of sensory problems and the original strap gave him a lot trouble. This is much better and is comfortable enough for him to use for a lot longer. It's better balanced even with the battery pack on the back. It can be easily adjusted so my husband and son can use the same one.

reviews.title: Long battery life
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:fba0e523a4c03a8dc77fc50efac53664]] I bought these for my sister to wear during hot yoga. She loves her airpods,  but they didn't stay in place well enough. I really like the wrap around the ear design. Even while upside down,  these stay exactly where they are supposed to. They are still super comfortable. The battery life is very long and the charging time isn't bad.

reviews.title: Very easy to install
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:40cb6b4a8fa9c5bf9167ed5c47143b8]] I bought this for my daughter who is getting a Nintendo switch for her birthday. She's still rather young so I wanted something that would protect it if she accidentally drops it. This is adorable. I love the color and it seems sturdy. It's also slightly flexible so it's easy to install. It fits perfectly and looks nice. The buttons still work fine through it and the screen is still clear. It protects the screen really well which is great because scratches can happen with just regular use without it.

reviews.title: Very user friendly
reviews.text: I must admit that I am not very tech savvy. I was very concerned that I would not be able to figure this out, but it is surprisingly easy. It is very user friendly and the instructions walk you through how to connect it to the Bluetooth. Other than it being wireless,  it works exactly the same way as a regular keyboard.

reviews.title: Great charger
reviews.text: Works well. Very convenient to do away with cords. I like the charge indicator lights also.

reviews.title: Lights cant be used with game consoles. Poor design.
reviews.text:
While this may not be a life or death situation, to a 10 year old who specifically picked these headphones for the "cool lights", it's a huge disappointment. Whoever designed these headphones is not the sharpest pencil in the box because the lights only come on when you plug the USB cable in. Well, considering the fact that the headphone jack for the ps4 is on the controller but the USB port is on the back of the console, that makes it pretty much impossible to plug the lights in.
If i had known this, i wouldve definitely bought a different product. I'm pretty disappointed.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.text: Works well. This is labeled as for Xbox 360 but I bought this for my son's Xbox one.

reviews.title: Fun game.
reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son. He loves it.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.text: My son loves the game. Perfect

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.text: Fun game.

reviews.title: Mmm great graphics BUT typical MS programming
reviews.text:
No task manger, no reset, hard power cycle only!! I dont remeber any of the Diablos crashing ever, or the Baldur's Gates... typical Microsoft, releasing something late and expensive and unfinished!
There are tons of cool ideas in this game but its a bit like the original arcade Dragon's Lair once the wow factor is over you have to live with the limitations...
Everyone should see this game but I wouldn't reccomend anyone actually buy it. If you're short of cash (or sensible about such things) then wait for Neverwinter Nights - most likely a much better investment...

reviews.title: Great product for strategy, RPG, and "long hours" gamers
reviews.text:
Serious gamers who spend long hours at the controller will definitely benefit from the xtendplay.
I tend to get lost in long hours of strategy and rpg games -- guess I'm a binge gamer. You kind of forget about the fact that you have it once you've got one, it's just there as a new part of your controller, but I really notice that I can game longer, and more comfortably.

Whether longer hours of gaming is a good thing in your life is something you have to decide for yourself, but if you want to game longer one of these will help.

reviews.title: Fun outing in the series
reviews.text: Fun game, the low gravity adds a new element, the maps get complicated and there's even more trekking back and forth than in previous franchise outings.

reviews.title: If you've never played a Far Cry game start with this one
reviews.text: I loved this game, an authentically involving and compelling experience. It's rare that my girlfriend and I both play a game all the way through, but we did with this one. Certainly the structures typical of the Far Cry franchise are evident here but I don't see that as a major drawback. The beast master angle on the game is very enjoyable. The hunter-gatherer stuff seems more important in this outing of the franchise, it seems more worthwhile than in other Far Cry games.

reviews.title: Bad for couch co-op
reviews.text: Brought this for couch co-op, I had high hopes after playing all the Borderlands in this manner and enjoying them, unfortunately Battleborn is awful for couch co-op. Terrible interface for co-op, no save, no character progression save, no fun. Just to start a co-op game you both have to play through the boring prologue with no way to skip the movies. May be a good network game for some but I'm deeply disappointed. Battleborn sucks for couch co-op, it's "story" mode is a crock.

reviews.title: Only the second decent PS4 game this year
reviews.text: U4 and Primal are the only games I've enjoyed so far this year. If you like the Uncharted this outing delivers on all the franchise's usual shenanigans, and it does so beautifully.

reviews.title: Too Hard to do anything fun, too boring otherwise
reviews.text: Infuriatingly annoying at every stage, the very worst of open world action RPG. If you enjoy load screens, endless fetch and carry missions, and pointless meandering storytelling this is the game for you, otherwise don't bother. Merely an exercise in frustration.

reviews.title: Great Bioware Storytelling, Awful Bioware Game and Interface design
reviews.text: There are some great moments in here but boy do you have to work for them. Worse even than Fallout 4, the interface lets this game down. If you're a dedicated franchise fan like me then you'll likely buy it, if not there are many, many, better game investments out there.

reviews.title: Perfect--if you're OCD
reviews.text:
If you're OCD, independently wealthy, stay-at-home, and chronically allergic to excitement ... then this is the perfect game for you. I've been playing computer RPGs since day 1, and this is the most borish, pedantic, long-winded, debacle of petty frustrations that I've ever come across.

Want to spent 12 hours of gameplay crafting a satchel? Then RDR2 is for you.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Looks flipping cool. No complaints

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Excellent condition. Was a replacement for my stolen collection of childhood games.

reviews.title: Excellent condition. Was a replacement for my stolen collection ...
reviews.text: Excellent condition. Was a replacement for my stolen collection of childhood games. Low quality on 3DS XL but that's to be expected.

reviews.title: I love Zelda. Definitely cool to be able to play ...
reviews.text: Playing it right now! I love Zelda. Definitely cool to be able to play some of the original games on new devices.

reviews.title: Terrible. Doesn't work even slightly.
reviews.text: Hate it. I had it sent to my home (I'm currently at college) so by the time I visited home and picked it up, I was unable to return it or request a replacement. I didn't spend much on it so I guess that's good but it's still money wasted and I still have to find a USB charge cable for my DS.

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.text: There's only storage space for about three games, which is disappointing. Perhaps that is my fault for not looking at the details of the case. In any case, I saw it for cheaper at Best Buy about a week after I ordered it. Price check guys.

reviews.title: Disappointed Overall
reviews.text: My daughter and I ordered the digital downloads directly from Nintendo's eShop, plus two pre-orders from Amazon to give as gifts. The graphics are a nice improvement, and being able to play with in-game friends is a welcome addition. The instructions are a little vague at times. The Bone Buggies, while nice, are harder to control. It is my opinion it's being compared as a selling tactic because of Pokemon's popularity. The Pokemon games are a favorite with our friends and family.

reviews.title: It looks nice, she's thrilled with it
reviews.text:
My daughter is enjoying her New Nintendo 3ds. She loves Pokemon, and wanted this cover plate. It looks nice, she's thrilled with it. I ordered myself a different cover plate that I'm happy with as well.
One thing that surprised me is how easily my cover plate got scratches. Nothing deep, but I thought I was being careful, so was surprised to notice them on the bottom already. I'll have to be extra careful if I want to keep scratches at a minimum.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.text: I wasn't crazy about this movie. Maybe my expectations where too high. I just couldn't get myself to care about anyone. The closest I came was when the Step-mother was feeling sorry for herself. I actually felt some pity for her situation, of course she was too mean and hateful to like. Anyway, it all seemed superficial to me, like not enough time was given for a true, caring story. It's not a movie I care to watch again.

reviews.title: Fun Little Side Game to Pass the Time
reviews.text: This is a cute, enjoyable game, if a little boring after a while. Designing character's houses, inside and out is fun, but it's not nearly as great as the original Animal Crossing game. It'd would make a nice add on for the next true Animal Crossing installment. This bundle deal is the best way to purchase if you're interested in the amiibo reader because of the savings. I'd have felt better a lot better about my purchase if Nintendo would have charged $29.99. If not for this bundle deal, I would have waited for a sell price later.

reviews.title: Yay!! Smaller New 3ds!!
reviews.text:
After using them I can happily say we are pleased with the smaller size. It's convenient for carrying if you have a smaller purse. I like the lighter feel of it in my hands. Having to spend $220.00 is a high price for anyone only interested in the New 3ds. It's really not a big deal for us because we love Animal Crossing so much.
Of course, the new included game can not compare to the original Animal Crossing game, but it's enjoyable for what it is. We would love to see some of the things from ACHHD included in the next true Animal Crossing game.

reviews.title: Lovable Cards
reviews.text:
Maybe this could be used to get your favorite villagers without using the cards.

It's my understanding that only the special character's, like Nook, Isabelle, etc., need the amiibo cards if you desire to decorate their homes. We haven't even played the game in a few days.

The Animal Crossing amiibo cards really are cute. I refuse to pay more than retail for an expensive game add on. After purchasing 21 sets so far from various stores, I'm about to call it quits.

reviews.title: Charming Role Playing Game
reviews.text: My daughter and I have been enjoying this game. We are RPG fans. I especially like the traditional turn based kind. We can't connect and play in this game together like we could with Fantasy Life, but it's still a very fun, charming game. I've purchased several copies as gifts.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Great item

reviews.title: Great, non-violent game
reviews.text: My 10-year-old son has been begging me for this game. I was happy to buy it because I have watched videos on this game and it is not violent and more about being a problem solver and exploring. He loves it, and I love that he is not blowing things up.

reviews.title: My son loves this
reviews.text: My son needed another control for when his friends are over. We ordered this and he uses it more than the wireless one he got with the machine. I like it because we aren't going through batteries like they grow on trees. Would buy again.

reviews.title: My son loves this game
reviews.text: My son saved his allowance for this game. It is ok. I really dislike that the characters can get drunk by drinking too much beer. I think this is a negative for kids, it make getting drunk fun.

reviews.title: Bummer game.
reviews.text: This game is frustrating. We can't get around the track without running into the walls or going off the track. I thought it was our fault because we aren't big gamers but I see we aren't the only ones with this issue. The game just doesn't sync well with the remote.Huge let down.

reviews.title: Perfect rechargeable batteries.
reviews.text: Work just great for charging my Wii controllers.

reviews.title: Not a fan of this one.
reviews.text: Not my favorite game. I was excited to find this game for my WIii since my son and I enjoyed the movie so much. I just don't like the interface with the remote. It was more frustrating then fun and I can't use a different controller.

reviews.title: Nope.
reviews.text: I usually like hidden object and find it games. But this one really annoyed me. At first I had fun but at a point it just got annoying. Once the puzzle is complete you have to search the house for other items to get out of the house. Then once that's done you have do do something else. I just stopped playing the game and said forget it. I wasn't so excited about the game to continue with the tasks. The other Ispy didn't thrill me either. So out these go.

reviews.title: Love this game wish there were more.
reviews.text:
You have a planet that rotates and from the center comes a colored spore that gives birth to a tree or mushroom. Good tool for the rest of life as well.
Knowing this helps to keep the focus in the game. Once you have gone through the play levels on all the chakras the free style meditation is unlocked, otherwise if you choose the reflection side you have only the guided meditation that is unlocked. I sit in a regular chair not on the floor. If I sit on the floor I use a pillow folder over to get the height and stability needed.

reviews.title: Tons of fun
reviews.text: I have enjoyed this game very much. Some courses are very challenging but still fun. I purchased the wheel accessory for the controller and that helps a lot. Makes the game easier to play. I still haven't been able to get my kid to play with me yet but I'm work'n on it!

reviews.title: Hated it.
reviews.text: This was a frustrating game for me. The interface sucks, so my avatar was falling or not responding. At first I thought it was my remote maybe low on charge but when I switched to a fully charged controller it was the same issue. I love the show but hate the game. I'll just stick to the show.

reviews.title: Must have for racing games.
reviews.text: These are great to add to the controller. Makes the racing games easier to play and they are small enough to reach all of the controls. Very nice.

reviews.title: Perfect alternative N64 Controller
reviews.text:
The original N64 controller design is really hard to use. I started to look for an alternative and found these.
They work great with my N64 and fit my hands better.
So glad I got these.

reviews.title: These are perfect
reviews.text: I was so glad to find these extensions for my N64. They add a few more feet to add a comfortable distance from the tv.

reviews.title: The Best $52.00 Investment you're gonna buy for your Xbox!
reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon and it's the best hard drive you can buy! It's 320 GB, more than enough space for all your games that you could save to your Xbox. I got it for my grand nephew and he was happy and so was I. He plays that xbox day & night like you wouldn't believe! Good thing this item came because he was bugging me for the last time claiming he was running out of space. Order yours from Amazon for they HONOR what they say: when they say overnight...they MEAN overnight shipping!! !

reviews.title: A great video game !
reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew in law's son who i babysit. He's 11 years old & has been playing Black Ops every single passing day for the last 9 Months and now was begging me to buy him this game as an early Christmas gift to w/c i bought one of these from Amazon and since I'm a Prime member, i got the game overnight. downstairs and this kid is gulping Red bull energy drink right & left and he's planning an overnight stay and camp out in front of our couch fro the next 2 days playing this damn game!

reviews.title: One of the BEST Zombie killing games EVER!!!
reviews.text: I ordered this game for my nephew because he was giving me a hard time for a game like this so I ordered one here in Amazon and we got it the next day. This is a great game specially if you're one of those  "The Walking Dead" series fanatics and cannot wait to basg your way through them. My nephew was happy and so am I. The game is rated NC-17 and not recommended for kids

reviews.title: "My Nephew Loves This game!"
reviews.text: I bought this game because my dear nephew is insisting to have it and I told him I want to see good grades from him and he promised me he would. About 2 weeks later he showed me his graded assignments and he's bragging that he got good grades so i bought this from Amazon. A day later we got it and he never stopped playing it the minute I handed to him until later that night, I needed to pry him out and threatened to take it back if he didn't stop playing it and prepared himself for the next school day. A great game for the xbox!

reviews.title: But i think it's better than using Illegal drugs OR having a hobby of ...
reviews.text: WARNING: PLEASE DO NOT get this video game console unless that you're sure you know what you're in for! I bought this because everybody in my immediate family ahs it and i was getting sick and tired of being left out when the boys & men in our family starts talking about the action they get playing video games. OMG.....this is Way too graphic and extremely brutal of a game  not to be played by children under 13 years old. The Unit i bought came with a 250 GB Hard driive and it came with 1 game called forza 4 and 1 downloadable game.

reviews.title: Turtle Beach Ear Force
reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. He loves Turtle Beach products. Great set.

reviews.title: As described perfect
reviews.text: Great gaming mouse.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Son likes it a lot works perfectly and great price.

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.text: Perfect controller better then the ones that come with original switch. Good price

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text: Great game, fun to play. Glad they made this for Nintendo switch.

reviews.title: Way too kiddish --
reviews.text: I bought this game because I thought it would be like New Super Mario, which I really liked. This game is for really little kids. There is no challenge value, and the game is pretty boring. Don't get this if you are an adult player!

reviews.title: Challenging, difficult, engaging
reviews.text: This game is very difficult and is up there with Tetris. I actually think it is much more difficult to keep up with Meteos, but it's a great game and you'll definitely enjoy playing.

reviews.title: Quite possibly the world's first perfect video game system
reviews.text: Why on earth would anyone buy anything else in terms of a system? The point is, Wii gets you off the couch and requires you to socialize! This system is for multiple people! You are actually up and jumping around, it's incredibly fun to play wii tennis with a friend. This is a very social system, and is really what video games have been missing.

reviews.title: Unplayable and boring
reviews.text: I bought this game because I loved New Super Mario and wanted to find another game I found addictive. First of all, this game is for little kids. But I can't imagine anyone enjoying it. It seems like it has no point. Sonic speeds through this "roller coaster" type course that goes so quickly it's not possible to follow. There is no challenge value, all you do it push the forward button and sonic moves really quickly until he gets to the end of the course or runs out of time. Maybe I missed the point of this game, but I wasted my money on this purchase.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.text:
Pretty nice mouse. I'm not a super gamer, in fact, I only play a few games; Spore and Mortal Kombat. Anyways, since I only play for an hour or two a week, I only notice a few differences, that it requires just a whisper of movement to use and that you have to be careful not to brush against all the extra buttons.

My son is the super gamer, he likes Team Fortress, Portal, Spore, Five Nights at Freddies, Goat Simulator, etc.

reviews.title: Good little product.
reviews.text:
This is working perfectly for my Mac Mini. I know this says it's for an xbox, but we don't have one. I bypassed the temperature sensor and am using it for my mac and its perfect. I'm sure it would work great for an xbox too.

It has a usb port and is very adaptable. Great product, a lot more lightweight than I was expecting which is nice too.

reviews.title: Swamp ear
reviews.text:
These are the nicest headphones I've ever experienced. Sound quality. I didn't realize how tinny and flat my old ones were until I tried these. Durability. Hot Ear. I haven't run out to buy canned air or tried my hand at inventing cooling gel ear muffs, but so far I can't wear these for more than an hour at a time without getting super sweaty hot ears. The headphones really clamp down on your head and sometimes the tension can make my head hurt.

But other than the head pain and itchy swamp ear, these are pretty great. Good luck!

reviews.title: Wonderful Quality, no pinching or sweatiness
reviews.text:
These are very comfortable for gamers or anyone else who wears a headset for more than two hours straight.

The sound quality was good enough for me to hear whispers and to really feel the action.

Sweating - I've had a problem with getting a hot, sweaty ear and it was distracting and in one instance, gave me an ear infection. Since then I've been hyper alert to this potential problem.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.text:
This bluetooth controller works great. Very disconcerting.

I used it to play minecraft, which was very fun and a bit easier with the controller.

Then I combined it with a handsfree cellphone carrier (Don't Judge), called 'Flexible Long Arms Stand Clip Holder,Hanging on Neck Universal Mobile Phone Stand Lounger's Bracket for Mobile Phone' and I sat in my recliner and read a book on my phone and used the bluetooth to flip pages in the book. It was surprisingly comfy and other than looking like a lazy slacker, relaxing.

reviews.title: Nice upgrade
reviews.text:
It seems a bit more responsive than his previous mouse. The added responsiveness really eliminates lag and makes gameplay more accurate.

So far he hasn't done much programming of the mouse because the standard settings are working pretty great for him with this newer version of Doom (he's been playing it nonstop for a week now).

As for the ergonomics, the curved shape is nice and the mouse is pretty lightweight, he does still get thumb fatigue, but I don't think there is any way around that.

reviews.title: Great new mouse
reviews.text:
The mouse wheel is like a lego tire with a very grippy tread.

5. The mouse has a good shape and all the butons have good click action, the side buttons have forward and back motion and this is the first time ive seen it before, a dpi sensitivity switch that cycles through several dpi settings.

6. I would like the option to change or turn off the lights sometimes, but this a minor issue and hardly affects my overall joy with this great little mouse.

reviews.title: Great for moist hands
reviews.text:
Just a few things about this silicon cover;

1. Easy installation - I had a painful burnt finger so I got my kid to put the cover on this controller and it was quick and simple.

3. Maybe it's all the pandemic lockdown handwashing and then moisturizing but ten minutes of gaming and the controller feels as slippery as a pumpkin seed. I like the cover, it adds a dollop of color to an otherwise dull white controller, like a sportscar with a bra (is that what those leathery front covers were called, bras?

reviews.title: Excellent keyboard
reviews.text:
I have lots of positive things to say about this mechanical gaming keyboard
1. The keys arent too sensitive which is a good thing since it makes it harder to fat finger them and do something wrong ingame

2. But my personal favorite thing about this keyboard is that this is very compact,it has the number pad, the F1-F12 keys, but it is still compact enough that I can fit it really well on my desk along with my wrist pad and a large mousepad.

reviews.title: Addictive fun.
reviews.text: Retiree here. This is an addictive game for me. The gun is easy to load and play. Taking the silicon cover off the remote (30 seconds), is the most complicated part. In other words. The shooting game is worth the purchase price. Some of the targets, (skeletons and other vile creatures), may frighten younger children and cause nightmares. This is a relaxing game to play after burning energy playing Wii Sports. For $20 (purchased one today at Best Buy, since Amazon is out til February), it is a value purchased, compared to other Wii items. Unless you hate arcade style shooting games, buy it.

reviews.title: Fun for all.  Easy to play.
reviews.text:
Retiree here. This is easy to play and a lot of fun. The free wheel is a nice touch. The remote fits perfectly, with no hassle. I purchased this because it's made by Ubisoft, and I enjoy their Rayman Rabbid Rabbits (1 and 2) games.

Update: Just purchased Wii Excite from Amazon. The wheel is great for Excite as well. Amazon's $39 price for Excite is the lowest I've seen. I found The Monster 4x4 as enjoyable as Excite.

reviews.title: Enjoyable. Generates laughter like Rayman 1.
reviews.text: Retiree here (retired CPA, Professor). New to gaming. I find this game more relaxing than Rayman 1, because it's easier to progress. If I was a hard core gamer, I'd be dissapointed. Currently bogged down in the hedgehog race. They help maintain hand/eye coordination, sense of timing, and both make you burst out laughing-if you enjoy the slapstick silly stuff. My wife doesn't. I think younger children will find Rayman 2, easier to play. Own:  Rayman 1 and 2. 4x4 World Circuit-another Ubisoft game. Excite Truck. Endless Ocean. Links Crossbow. Wii Play. Only Wii Play has dissapointed.

reviews.title: You will burst out laughing.
reviews.text: Retiree here. My rating is based entirely on the laugh factor. Being new to gaming, I am slowing progressing through the levels. Made it to the hedgehog race, but failed it four times. Good graphics, nice games. It forces you to use, increase and maintain hand/eye coordination, and timing. The dancing games are especially helpful. Some of the other Rayman Rabbid minigames have increased my heartrate to 125. That adds worthwhile aerobic exercise to the game's other pluses. Too difficult for my four year old grandson. One negative. See my review of Rayman 2.

reviews.title: A nice pleasant game.  Priced right.
reviews.text: Retiree here. This is a relaxing game, and priced right at $29.99. Probably would have been dissapointed if the price was higher. For a relatively low price, this is a relaxing game for anyone, and highly educational for youngsters. Very nice for occasional play. After spending some time with this game, I plan to take my 4 year old grandson to the local acquarium, and then let him play the game. He will enjoy it after visiting the aquarium, not before. As a skin diver (not scuba diver), I consider this game realistic, and it brought back memories of skindiving in Hanuma Bay, Hawaii.

reviews.title: Why can't they make a decent sized bag for the price?
reviews.text: I purchased this bag to keep my Wii games and nunchucks in. I wanted an attractive bag in my family room, next to my Wii. I realize that is not the intended purpose of this bag. The cardboard cased Links Crossbow and Wii Sports fit in the front pocket. Instruction manuals don't fit. Hoped my extra two guest wimotes would fit. For the prices charged on Wii goods, give us some value. I wish I went I went to the local bowling alley and purchased a child's bowling bag to keep my Wii accessories in. I usually give high ratings. See my reviews. Not on this mini.

reviews.title: A golf game that makes you laugh. Not for serious golfers.
reviews.text: Retiree here. After reaching pro level on Wii golf, I wanted to play a different golf game. The same course (Wii golf) is too repetitive. Totally different than Wii golf, and should not be confused with a real golf match game. They are lifelike humans, rather than cartoonish. The costumes range from conservative to highly suggestive. She has a cute voice. Marginal help. The special shots are fun. I like Rayman Rabbits. I think 8 years and up is an appropriate age level. Girls 8+ will especially like the different costumes and accessories available.

reviews.title: Nice game for 4-8 age group.
reviews.text: Retiree here. I purchased this so that my 4 1/2 year grandson could have an easy game. Rayman was too difficult. He found Endless Ocean boring. Though this game does require some use of the buttons in all minigames, (at least if you want a good score), it will still be his favorite game. Tetherball and slot cars are probably the easiest game. I would rate each minigame in the package, entertaining. I think it's a nice 4 star game. Simple games with minimal instructions can be very nice. Another plus. Update:  My grandson now plays and loves slot car racing.

reviews.title: Long manual.  Takes time to learn.
reviews.text:
Update: Followed discussion advice and purchased a classic controller. As a newbie, I didn't realize the classic controller plugs into the nunchuck slot, so I still have a totally wireless connection.

Original review: Retiree here. This is my first baseball video game. In the easiest modes, this is very entertaining. The wimote mode is fun. It's great seeing every major league park, in excellent detail. I went to the practice mode to practice hitting, and I still have a tough time, lining up the sweetspot with a fast moving baseball. I would appreciate any tips.

reviews.title: Great game for all ages.  Takes seconds to learn.
reviews.text: Retiree here. This is my first video pinball. I was a pinball addict 50 years ago, but am not familiar with these games. I have HDTV, and the Nintendo component cables, but found the graphics more blurry (less in focus), than other games. I suspect this is caused by the need to have a tremendous amount of detailed graphics, of many different colors, in a very compact area. I do have my Wii and TV set to the proper resolution. Other games, such as MLB Pro, and Super Swing 2 have great graphics, considering the Wii does not come in high definition.

reviews.title: 4 year old grandson loves it.
reviews.text:
My grandson is 4 YEARS 7 MONTHS. He had been quickly bored with my Wii games. He loves the Wii Excite. He loves it because I have a wheel, and he can steer it like the games at an arcade (Pizza place, bowling alley).

He loves it because there are no rules. He can constantly crash into trees, go off cliffs, and sink in water. No problem. The game allows you to keep going and even awards points for good crashes. It's a great game for youngsters. It's also fun for anyone else that likes truck racing games.

reviews.title: Nintendo makes quality products.
reviews.text: I have 4 remote controllers and have never had a problem. That's amazing considering all the shaking they get. 100% satisfied.

reviews.title: I just don't know if this item is worth buying.
reviews.text:
This is a quality item, well made and fits perfectly into the Wii, and the TV. I have HDTV with outstanding resolution on HDTV shows.

I read the directions, set both the Wii and TV to the correct resolutions. I honestly couldn't tell the difference between these and the standard cables. I wouldn't buy the item again.

reviews.title: Necessary item for quite a few games.
reviews.text: High quality item that's useful in quite a few games. I purchased a second one to keep in my WII Zapper.

reviews.title: I like this one better then the original
reviews.text: The New Carnival Games took care of both those issues.

reviews.title: Hated this game, traded it in for Amazon credit
reviews.text: Too many glitches, hard to see the screen its so dark. The story could have been with anyone and I think it only sold because of Mickey. I traded it into Amazon games for $30 because it made me so frustrated. It does not tell you what you are doing half the time and killing baddies is way too hard. This game should have went through more testing before it was released.

reviews.title: So happy with this charger...
reviews.text: I had the old Nyko charger that fit two wii remotes which took forever to balance the remotes so that the light turned blue. I wanted to upgrade because I bought a new wii but have 4 remotes. I have them on the charger at all times and they never get hot or cause any problems. I researched all of the different types of chargers because my last Nyko was horrible. They fixed the design flaws and this one works great.

reviews.title: Wii game with added content...nothing new
reviews.text: It is the same game as wii but with extra carts and better graphics. You can still play online and can play with any controller setup you want. Good for groups or online play but kind of boring doing the same thing over and over. The main thing I was disappointed in was the prompts hitting you up to buy more addons for the game. At $55 they should include more content.

reviews.title: Great game, same content as before
reviews.text: I love the game but a lot of the content is just reused from previous versions. I love being able to fish, catch bugs, and go diving. The downfall is you get to go to this island where you can pretty much catch all of the bugs and fish before the seasons turn.

reviews.title: Not as good as previous games
reviews.text: The game play is fun, but I miss the old game play style. I miss getting vending machine objects to sabotage other players. And I miss the mini games after everyone rolls. I wish they would have integrated the Amiibo play into the actual game instead of making it a side game with the same board design with different graphics for every Amiibo. Any Amiibo's that are not in the "super mario" category you can scan once a day and play a scratch card game to get points which you then use in the store.

reviews.title: Everything is awesome
reviews.text: I love this game. It is funny and super fun.

reviews.title: Same game, some updates
reviews.text: I love Kirby epic yarn so when I saw the Kirby Extra Epic yarn I had to buy it right away. I am disappointed that this is the EXACT same game as the Wii version but with different abilities that were missing from the original game. Still one of my favorite games but I think Nintendo is getting lazy. They just reproduce old games with a shiny new wrapper and a few new tricks and it costs $40. Well played Nintendo, well played. Also, this game is not 3D.

reviews.title: Its not a bad controller. The wife and I purchased 2 for ...
reviews.text:
Its not a bad controller. The wife and I purchased 2 for our boys a few Xmas ago. I wish it were supported easier on the Mac for more games. But no big deal at the moment. I am hoping for more use if the rumors are true and you can start using iOS apps on the Mac.

The only issue I have is the battery, it fails to charge properly, after only a year or two of very casual usage. I wish the batteries were changeable for the price I paid. Even Xbox controllers have user replaceable batteries. If it had that user replaceable battery I would feel better.

reviews.title: Check those distances.
reviews.text:
Does exactly what it said it would, and holds the xbox securely. I elected to mount it behind the TV directly to the plaster using the provided anchors.
Two users issues, if your mounting it near your TV wall mount. 1 Make sure and orientate the retaining edge in the direction you wish. I overlooked this but luckily got it right on the initial mounting. 2. Make sure and leave enough space between the bracket and any other mounts so you can actually place the unit in the mount. I came super close to not being able to get mine into the mount. Very sturdy construction.

reviews.title: Does what you want it to do.
reviews.text: Not much to say but it holds the controllers nicely. I elected to use the provided adhesive as it simply stuck to my wall better than some quick release brands. No issues at all. Pleased with my purchase.

reviews.title: Works as intended and keeps my teen happy.
reviews.text: My teen has been in love with Zelda since I introduced him to my old Nintendo games, years ago. I purchased this for his as a gift. If I didn't now better he was sleeping with it. Perfect gift for a Zelda buff. No issues at all. Wonderful purchase.

reviews.title: Lots of fun.
reviews.text: Although this seemed to take forever to get to me, it was worth the wait. All the games you can play online with family across the ocean and talk makes this a fantastic purchase. Enables us to let our children play with their cousins.

reviews.text:
Well, This review is only aimed at the business partnership between blizzard and amazon. Very disappointed. I can order a hard copy this time. Worst mistake ever. What a b word. But keep in mind that the blizzard and amazon support side of things needs serious help.

Amazon did finally credit me back my purchase price so I did recieve a free expansion in the end. I did have to blatently demand this action as a long time consumer of amazon and as a seller. But the factor of difficualty and frustration in doing so was extreme,.

reviews.title: not ready for release...
reviews.text:
not ready or defective. I'm certain the issue was the cable included with the headset. Lots of snow and static on screen that didnt show up in a screen mirror on your real screen.

Was ignored and treated very poorly by oculus support. I tested 3 high end vr pcs with it btw. And Amazon didnt offer replacement of item. The oculus drivers upscale everything into 4k even if the monitor being displayed is only 1920x1080... this results in unbearable stutter in the majority of non vr games.

reviews.title: like having disc
reviews.text: good sale price. 31.49 in October 2019. I like having the disc.

reviews.title: better than a rift s and mobile
reviews.text: Until I heard about the Oculus Link technology and witnessed first hand ALVR running PC VR on a Quest.... Bought one, I love it, Best thing ever!!!!! The Rift S is dead! or wireless with ALVR like I said. instead of connecting to your local wifi network. buy a good USB 3.0 wifi dongle. and then create a hotspot network in windows withit. Conect to your hotspot via the quest and make sure your PC is wired to your network instead of wireless. But doing this will remove any network latency or traffic from your wifi. If you do this you can play ALVR wireless PC VR no problem!

reviews.title: Love this controller
reviews.text: For a while, I wanted to get a pink controller to add to my collection. This controller is exactly what I wanted. I have only one complaint- the right joystick drifts a little bit sometimes. This can be annoying when playing a game that requires precision. I truly believe that this is an isolated case and something that could happen with any microsoft controller- not just the pink ones. I could probably recalibrate it easily, but honestly, the problem isn't so bad that I have felt the need. I love that this is a pink controller- it is mine and all of the guys don't mess with it when they come over!

reviews.title: All the nostalgia... none of the blowing in the cartridges!
reviews.text: I have had my USB NES controller for a couple years and it has been AWESOME. This is works perfectly with every emulator that I have used it with! It really adds to the experience to be able to play the games on a retro controller, even if I don't have the big cartridges that I need to blow in!

reviews.title: Not disappointed
reviews.text:
I wasn't sure what to expect. Some a lot of reviews complained that they got the clear cases (which is secretly what I actually wanted). I got the package and found 3 colored cases (Made in Mexico) in light blue, blue, and green, but the other 5 were original gameboy clear game cases (YAY)!

I will possibly order more!

reviews.title: A classic
reviews.text: The game is a classic and everyone should own it (gameplay is 5 stars). The cartridge I got was in OK condition, but it did take me a while to find the exact way it wanted to be inserted and not load corrupted. I did figure it out after a lot of tries on a couple different Gameboys. Save function works!

reviews.title: The cartridge loaded without too much of a hassle and saved just fine!
reviews.text: Used game was definitely owned by a kid! The cartridge loaded without too much of a hassle and saved just fine!

reviews.title: The ultimate go-to version of tetris!
reviews.text:
If you don't know about Tetris, you must have lived under a rock for the last 30 years... No wait... even the rock people know about Tetris!

This game is intuitive for the beginner, but is it really ever mastered? For me, this is the go-to version of Tetris!

reviews.title: This charger works just fine, but I am taking a star off because ...
reviews.text: This charger works just fine, but I am taking a star off because the new 3DS doesn't ship with one!

reviews.title: Wonderful, but not without some faults!
reviews.text: While cell phone games do have plenty of engaging time-killing games to offer, I was missing games with some depth and story; like Zelda! Taking the device out of the box, the first thing you will notice is the pristine shiny surfaces that greet you! This device actually has some heft to it! The top screen is beautiful and sharp. Streetpass and spotpass add a whole other dimension of entertainment. All the old Nintendo franchises have games for the 3DS that have a terrific balance between familiar characters and new spins on gameplay that develop the story.

reviews.title: Perfect game for taking on the go.
reviews.text: This game is fun. I love music and rhythm, so I really do enjoy playing this game. Everything about this game is bite size, so it is perfect for those times you have a minute to kill. There are plenty of other games that I love, but I need to sit and play them for long periods of time. This is just one of those games that you can pick up and play for a few minutes at a time. It is also varied enough that you can sit and play long stretches if you want without getting bored. I find the game a little more challenging then I anticipated, but certainly something that can be mastered.

reviews.title: I like it better than the New 3DS XL
reviews.text: I bought a New 3DS XL a while back, but quickly learned that it was a little bulky for my liking and I was noticing that I was having a bit of fatigue in my hands and wrists. It is the perfect size for travel. The new features increase the options for game developers (ZL/ZR buttons, c-stick). The new 3D face tracking makes using 3D more immersive and less of a practice of patience. If I had list any complaint is that the new 3DS consoles do not come with the power supply.

reviews.title: Good for travel and cames that don't need precision L3/R3 input
reviews.text: I love that this is such an easy controller to toss in a bag without worrying about damaging joysticks. I particularly like using this with tetris 99. It is lighter and puts less strain on the wrists than playing in handheld mode.

reviews.title: Better than waiting for Nintendo
reviews.text: Now that Animal Crossing is out, I am using the stick more; the issue was getting worse and more annoying. The replacement took less than 20 minutes, following a youtube video of the left stick replacement (it looks like the right stick replacement is a bit harder and more involved - the video said that the right stick may be too much for most people on the switch lite). Couldn’t remember where I put the extra stick from the last swap so I bought a new one.

reviews.title: These batteries are really good. I have played my Xbox for four days without a charge
reviews.text: These batteries are really good. I have been planned my Xbox for four days two hours per day, at least it seems to be working out really well. Thank you so much Amazon for providing quality products at reasonable prices .

Only problem I have, and have contacted Amazon and Microsoft about this, was the two different release dates for Ultimate digital and regular digital version. Also, it's advertised the digital ultimate version receives early access to the Definitive Edition game, but not the physical disc ultimate edition, which makes no sense at all.

reviews.title: Quality underrated MOBA, well worth the investment of time
reviews.text: Thoroughly addicted to this one, been playing since beta. Blizzard regularly updates, players aren't force to purchase anything, but I have plenty of times. Not as played as League, but definitely should be. Most people won't give it a try, but once you get into it, like any other Blizzard game, you're hooked.

reviews.title: An amazing collection of video game history
reviews.text:
From my teenage son:

This is by far my favorite smash game. I agree that online mode lag can be excessive, but I don't find that it causes me to lose many matches. Balancing is kind of tricky... As it is quiet apparent that not every fighter is made equally, I feel like most of these accusations of overpowered or weak characters are over exagerated, as every fighter has their own strengths and weaknesses.

reviews.title: A fantastic port, but very buggy.
reviews.text: Minecraft itself is of course a great game, and it's great to be able to play it anywhere I want. The problem being that the switch seems to have a hard time running the game. It crashes quite often, and even lags in single player mode. These bugs can sometimes make it hard to play. All things considered though, it's a really great game, and you can really spend hours and hours on it without realizing it, so I think four stars is pretty fair.

reviews.title: A challenging game with a immersive world
reviews.text:
Hollow Knight is a beautifully crafted,immersive , poetic, and terrifying world. From the moment you start the game, you don't know how to do almost anything, the game literally throws you into the world so you can slowly figure it out for yourself.
The overall theme of this game works so well, almost everything about this game wants you to feel lost. From the confusing tunnels, to the fierce enemies, it can be really easy to get overwhelmed.

reviews.text:

One tip: do like others recoomend and cut the little straps out, this case keeps the Vita safe enough without them and they are just kind of annoying.

reviews.title: A great, but necessary service
reviews.text: Playstation Plus is a no brainer. With the free games you get every month the service pays for itself in a few months. It is also required now to play games online on the PS4 but that's no problem because the service is still a great value over the competition...cough...Xbox Live...cough cough.

reviews.title: A significant improvement in design
reviews.text: The rubber covering the thumb sticks on the controller that came with my PS4 on launch day is wearing off. This controller ditches that rubber for easy to grip textured plastic. The texture on the grips is also an improvement for during those moments when your palms get sweaty.

reviews.title: Destiny, but way better
reviews.text: It was at that point, where I was listing to this message while also ducking behind cover to avoid the gunfire from looters, that The Division hooked me. I am a big fan of Destiny, a game The Division shares a lot with in terms of a persistent online world, but in that one moment The Division showed more story than Destiny's entire campaign, The Taken King expansion included. You aren't fighting against some vague alien presence that for one reason or another is mad at the human race but everyone is too busy to explain why they are too busy to explain it to you, you are fighting for these people whose lives were suddenly uprooted.

reviews.title: Much better than I expected

reviews.title: Great cool functional keyboard! Well priced.
reviews.text: It's a simple USB keyboard with good size keys, there is a key that turns on the rainbow colored lights, it took me a minute to discover it, but it's on the top right. Great keyboard, but the colors can only be in a rainbow pattern. Which is pretty cool. The keys are well separated and have a nice positive feedback when pressing them. Reminds me of the keyboards from the 1980's. This Rii keyboard is wired, but It needs to be to power up the LED background. My son loves it for the gaming, but I like to use it in the dark while my baby sleeps.

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed !
reviews.text: It is very easy to install and remove. The fit is snug and feels nice and comfortable in my hands. I particularly like the rocker caps that it comes with so I can get the right feel I want and need. This switch controller grip is definately a wise investment. If you found this review helpful, kindly vote below so I may improve my future reviews as well. Thank you!

reviews.title: Tiny little dock.
reviews.text:
This tiny switch dock works great. It's a great secondary dock for your switch if you need one. Very small and very lightweight. I am very happy with this purchase.
If you find my review helpful, kindly vote below so I can improve my future reviews. Thanx

reviews.title: Wow ! Awesome Graphics.
reviews.text: ( No Real Spoilers ) The wait is finally here. In this game I was thrust into the shoes of V, a mercenary in Night City who ends up with the psyche of long-dead rockstar and anti-corporate terrorist Johnny Silverhand trapped in their head. The graphics are really awesome and has an excellent gripping quest design. And even when missions stop, Cyberpunk 2077 keeps things interesting by turning you into a Batman Arkham-esque investigator. The fun factor, replayability, and value for money is undeniable. This is definitley the best gaming gift for this season that will entertain everyone. Fast same-day shipping in my area. Game arrived in perfect condition.

reviews.title: Great characters and sharp and witty humor.
reviews.text:
The battles always feel winnable, even against tougher opponents, but you can always unlock new combat and passive abilities to defeat them. I like that Fenyx is a fully customizable character, shipwrecks on the Golden Isle, a magical land where some of the gods reside.
The storyline ia like A Greek comedy!

reviews.title: A Good investment. Works well with Oculus Quest 2 VR
reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:16ef0f4b44ae49555383a8c87d52d50b]] I wanted to invest in a good quality Oculus cable and came across this one on Amazon. This Fiber-Optic cable works well and has a fast 5Gbps data transfer rate. I am also happy that this cable is long and braided for more durability as well.
Furthermore, it's powerful enough to charge the headset while playing, so you absolutely never have to worry about it running out in the middle of your gaming session.
I've yet to encounter any sort of issues so I am leaving a five star review.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.text: Works great, provides long charge of controller, and light indicator on charging base is helpful. Convenient and even provides a stand to store the controllers overnight while charging. Zero complaints. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: great game!
reviews.text: Been playing this game for over a month for several hours a day and I still have not finished the game. Longest lasting game I ever bought!

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.text:
007 Nightfire is out for all major platforms, in time for the latest Bond film. In the first 'training' mission, you're driving a car through city streets. From the Austrian castle and other alpine scenes, to the city scenes, watery scenes and more, each really shines.
The plot is very engaging and typically Bond. Grab some bots for practice, and play arena, team arena, king of the hill, capture the flag, or other game types.
Definitely worthy of the Bond series, and highly, highly recommended to any first person shooter fan!

reviews.title: Too many button options to make it enjoyable to play
reviews.text: Game too complicated to enjoy. Too many options/combinations in the buttons to make just playing he game enjoyable. Story line is okay but usability makes this no fun. Constantly clicking or pressing the buttons in the wrong order don't produce simple things like reloading or selecting a weapon quickly. Just too much of a hassle/ learning curve compared to other shooter games like call of duty, etc.

reviews.title: Fun game. Lots or replay ability. Would recommend
reviews.text: Lots of fun to play. Lots of replay ability since you have freedom to choose how the mission is carried out. I've beaten the game on the hardest level after a few weeks, and I still come back to play missions and approach them differently with different planes. I would recommend this game. Game controls are pretty simple to master.

reviews.title: Long battery life and priced right
reviews.text: A little clunky to get the controller to sit just right to enable the charger, but overall, works well, and I can play all night with no problems. I like the option of being able to add more chargers to it, if I decided to get additional controllers. Much less expensive than other brands, and I’ve used Nyko chargers for years. I would recommend this.

reviews.title: Fast, quiet, and powerful. Very happy with it.
reviews.text:
Very happy with my new console. Fast, great build quality and amazing graphics and gameplay. I added an external 4 Terabyte Seagate drive to store the games a couple of weeks later, while I’ll keep my game saves and profile on the internal drive.
I do think 1TB is kinda stingy of them for a brand new console, considering just 3 games I have take up almost 9 percent of the drive. Average game download is now 18-40 GB each, especially if you are getting Xbox One enchanced games. I do wish the interface had less self promotion and ads to buy Xbox live and other crap.

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.text: Fun game, wish the single story line was a bit longer, but more challenging than previous editions. Would recommend

reviews.title: Great single player game
reviews.text: Great game. Awesome single player, long lasting gameplay. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Locks up frequently on a Xbox One X !
reviews.text: Got the ultimate edition, got all the latest patches and updates before I even tried playing the game. It frequently locks up when trying to go to locations to do an event. Especially locks up when trying to fast travel from one location to another. Unfortunately I can’t offer a true review of the gameplay, but since it doesn’t work on a new Xbox one X with a fast and reliable internet connection, I’m going to give it two stars for crappy compatibility. Need for speed payback at least works and has way better car customization features.

reviews.title: Great single player game.
reviews.text: Fun single player game. Kept me entertained for many many hours. Highly recommended for someone who doesn’t like online gaming. Challenging, open world with the freedom to do as wish in the order you decide. I like that the decisions you make, affect the game later on. I would recommend this game.

reviews.title: Great fun. Has many aspects of other successful games which make this very enjoyable.
reviews.text:
I was completely surprised at how much fun this game is. It has elements of Need for Speed, GTA, and Black Ops, all rolled into one fun game. The game is challenging with puzzles, technology, shooting, racing with cars AND boats! , covert ops and cop chases.
I would highly recommend this game. Even the online challenges (which do NOT require xbox Gold) are extremely entertaining as you work with or against other online players. Since I only spent 8 dollars on this brand new, it’s totally worth it !

reviews.title: Not fun, not challenging. Good for very young players perhaps.
reviews.text: Eh, good for little kids I guess. As an adult gamer, it’s not challenging or even really fun. It’s completely guided, you can’t die, and you basically collect coins like Mario brothers and solve simple puzzles. It’s also lacking the witty dialogue LEGO games usually have. I’d pass on this game.

reviews.title: Great gameplay, online play sometimes spotty
reviews.text: The campaign mode is challenging, and fun. I love the hacking invasion of another player. It’s a lot of fun to mess with people by blowing stuff up, sending gang members after them etc. My only complaint though is a big one. The online play frequently locks up and actually causes my Xbox One X to shut off! It ONLY locks up when playing online through their Ubisoft servers. The group races, or showdown events are rarely useable because of the lack of participation from online play. I’d recommend this game, but be aware of its pitfalls.

reviews.title: Puzzle like game that I found a bit boring.
reviews.text: I didn’t enjoy this game as much as I thought I would. It’s mostly a puzzle like game firguing out how to get around one obstacle to the next. Good graphics, but still kinda boring for my taste.

reviews.title: Fun game, great online play too.
reviews.text: Fun game, lots of replay ability, and multiplayer is also fun without the hassle of online harassment. I’ve certainly gotten my money’s worth playing this game over and over. The missions are challenging, and the planes are different enough to use different planes for different missions.

reviews.title: Fun game, wish night mode had off road events.
reviews.text: Pretty fun game, though the story line is pretty short. As for single player mode, I like the arcade racer genre very much, and the cop chases are more difficult. A definite improvement over the previous NFS games, but there is still a lot of room for playing improvement. One specific annoyance is the inability to change the controls. The horn is located as a push on the left stick which also has major functionality for steering, so frequently as I turn a corner, the horn goes off. SUPER ANNOYING, seemingly an easy fix by allowing custom button controls.

reviews.title: Eh. Mildly amusing
reviews.text: Mildly amusing for a few hours. Haven’t played again since.

reviews.text:
This headset is very comfortable.
Sound is good.
I dont really like the flip up to mute the mic.
Strange sqeaking noise when rotating headset. Not sure why but its annoying.
No connection issues whats so ever.
No one has ever complained about my chat sound.
most important no WIRES no dongle.
So if u are tired of unplugging your wire from your controller and having a wire going across your body all the time this is definitely the way to go. Both sides have broken but I was able to but a zip tie on it.

reviews.title: Good value.

reviews.text:

Arrived quickly and only took a few minutes to replace the base. I've swapped the faceplate and buttons so I had some experience.

Recommend for a good look and feel. Paddles fit well, nothing is loose or rattles.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text: Easy to install, fixing the one my daughter broke off. Looks original and all needed tools are included. Take your time and you'll be good to go in no time.

reviews.title: Fixed the drift.
reviews.text:
Like some out there my daughters Switch had joy con drift. I have experience repairing small electronics so it was easy enough. I think anyone that can take their time and follow directions would be able to accomplish the repair easily enough.

The package contains 2, I only needed one, and it was a good thing. The other was perfect. Send company an email and they replaced the whole package very quickly. I'll always stand by a company or vendor that takes care of the customer when something happens.

reviews.title: Surprised.
reviews.text:
I'm a bit older hand have a hard time holding on to the switch lite while playing through this pandemic.
Bought these not really expecting too much. Wasn't fond of how it seemed the other products would work.

Snapped on easily and you have plenty of options. Have had for a few months and it is holding up nicely.
I'd not only recommend for the younger crowd, but for...more mature gamers.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.text:
Pleased with the fit and finish of the shells. Everything needed to complete the transfer is included in the kit.

Suggest taking your time and taking pictures as you go. Overall the difficulty isn’t too high for beginners and easy for anyone who has worked or tinkered with small electronics.

reviews.title: Works well.
reviews.text:
Not a whole lot to say. Controllers fit well without a struggle, it charges quick enough.
Stylish and a decent enough price. I’ve seen others with a logo stenciled on at twice the price.

So yeah, good charger.

I wasn't disappointed when I found this awesome case! The image is imprinted. Zipper is sturdy. It isn't huge so it's easy to carry. Looks expensive when it was a steal!

reviews.title: Minecraft Xbox One
reviews.text:
I bought this because my grandchildren love love love Minecraft. They have been playing it on ps3, pc, xbox 360 and then I got xbox one.
The graphics are so much better. My son in law came over tonight to borrow a controller and the game because he bought an xbox one also, after listening to my grandson tell him how much fun he was having with it versus xbox 360. This game looks so much better on obox one....you are going to love it if you play.

reviews.title: Fallout 4 Xbox One
reviews.text: my grandson spent the entire day sitting next to me playing this game and explaining what he was doing. He is a fan of Bethesda games and had been playing the pc version but wanted to try the xbox version. He said this is better because he can't cheat like he could playing on the computer. I guess you can get a god code that unlocks things.

reviews.title: New Nintendo 3ds Xl
reviews.text: This is a Christmas Gift for my grandson. I will be trying it out to make sure it works properly.

reviews.text: as with any screen on tablets, game units, phones, etc., I find them a necessary add-on for Nintendos.

reviews.title: Meta Knight amibo
reviews.text: got this for grandson's christmas present along with the nintendo 3ds.

reviews.title: Pikachu madness for your Nintendo 3ds xl
reviews.text: I purchased this product as a Christmas present for my Pokémon crazy grandson. He should love this case, since it features one of his favorite pokemons. He is also getting the Nintendo 3ds xl and a new Pokémon game. Trust me, he will be thrilled!

reviews.title: Comfortable communicator for  Xbox pals.
reviews.text: This lightweight Titanfall 2 Official Marauder Six Four Communicator for Xbox One works great. I hooked it up to my iPhone and my laptop and made volume adjustments on each until I got perfection. Also, when using your Xbox, make sure you adjust that volume accordingly on your tv for optimal results. When I used it to make a phone call, I could barely hear my hubby until I checked the volume level on my iPhone. I liked that I could use my controller (only the new model) without any other attachments. It will not plug into the first gen Xbox one controllers.

reviews.title: Dance your heart away
reviews.text:
Ubisoft has figured out how to get you dancing and how to give you a trial to for additional music with Just Dance Unlimited. There is also a free app for Just Dance 2017, which allows your smartphone to be the controller. You can share your own pictures from the photo booth and share on Facebook.

This makes for a totally immersive video and social experience,

reviews.title: Sing your heart out.
reviews.text: Christmas gift for the girl who decided she wanted to sing with a microphone. The songs will be all ones that she is familiar with so she can sing right along.

reviews.title: Pokemon Moon for Nintendo 3ds
reviews.text: Christmas gift for grandson who is pokemon crazy. He will love it.

reviews.title: Get ready for some swordfight, slicing and dicing
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:526540efc86f0b351cd8c3fe4de35af7]] The For Honor game eats up a whopping 32.30GB and that is before I add the Legacy Battle Pack. game. The graphics are gorgeous. Got the game running and did the practice sparring with the dummies. This appears to be an exciting game with lots of slicing and dicing. The boy child should love it. Even after the beginning video ends, the graphics continue to be great. The only complaint I have is how long it took to connect to the servers. The boy child likes to play with the universe.

reviews.title: a mechanical keyboard that you will love
reviews.text: A mechanical keyboard with lots and lots of lights. I am like a kid with a new toy! I love a gaming keyboard. I love the clackity clack and I love the colors....all of those programmable colors to make them unique to over 300 gaming profiles. Want a softer color, go to the Logitech support website and download the software so you can customize just about anything you could want out of this keyboard. You can program all function keys to simplify tasks and you have 26 key rollover where you can press any number of keys for complex moves.

reviews.title: Chat and hear everything going on around you
reviews.text: The boy likes to use the Turtle Beach Recon when he games so that he and the other players can strategize and whip some butt. He is a pretty good player and tells adults how to move forward in the game. He can easily hear me when I tell him it is too loud. For the price point, these are great headsets for Xbox and for PS4. The last pair I bough him was a year ago so he will be excited when he sees this new one.

reviews.title: great sound
reviews.text: I am loving the sound coming out of these earphones. The bass is great. The earphones come with two different types of ear tips. You get noise isolation the further you insert the earphones in your ears. The white buds offer more treble. The earphones have a hybrid driver that gives you Hi-Fidelity, low distortion and a very good bass. This is the first pair that I have used that has this capability of hybrid driver and I can say that it works very well. Love them.

reviews.title: PS3 Wireless Controller by Amazon?
reviews.text: I don't like corded controllers, because of how limited you are in motion. This wireless controller easily fixes that issue. The button setup is a little different from my original ps3 and aftermarket ps3 controllers. It looks more like xbox 1 controller, which gives me the sense of having the same playing  moves that you use with xbox, Because I didn't play a game and only made sure it worked and checked the menu of my ps3, I do not know if this has the dual shock ability. If it doesn't, we will use the other dual shock controllers when playing a game that benefits from that feature.

reviews.title: Cinderella Cinderella (bet the tune is running in your head now)
reviews.text: This was a used movie and we only had one spot that may or may not be corrected by cleaning. The movie is good and well done. I am liking the live action Disney movies. They are quite beautiful.

reviews.title: Lictin sent me another stand and it is working great
reviews.text: No matter how hard I tried, I could not get the stand to hold either of the xbox one controllers. I have several from xbox one and two from xbox one s. None would fit in the charging slot. I sent it back. Lictin contacted me and sent me a replacement. This one works great. Customer service is exceptional. I am very pleased that I can use the stand.

reviews.title: Xbox One S is the bomb
reviews.text: Love the Xbox One S. I easily swapped all my games from the Xbox One with a portable drive and making the new Xbox One S the main unit. I would recommend this Console and the bundle.

reviews.title: Nice Xbox One controller
reviews.text: This controller came as part of an Xbox One S bundle, so I got a total of two controllers. I like the feel of this controller and when not in use, it sits atop the charging base to keep it ready for action.

reviews.title: Sleek storage for Nintendo Switch games
reviews.text: This case for the Nintendo Switch system is a nice little case. It is small enough to stash in a pocket or backpack and it holds 24 game cards and one spot that can hold a game or a memory card. This is a vast improvement over the DSi card holders. The case is slick, opaque and set up in such a way that you only have to flip from one page to the next. The front has a two snap closure, making it easier to keep secure when closed.

reviews.title: Easy charging for controllers
reviews.text: works just like I would expect. Easy to attach to controller and charges easily.

reviews.title: Keep your Nintendo Switch grips looking new
reviews.text: These colorful neon grips will work perfectly on the Nintendo Switch. These are colorful and bright and they are also comfortable. If you have a Nintendo Switch, you will want accessories like this. The also includes thumb covers. They do wear out with use. As do the originals. Which is why you need the covers - to save the integrity of the original. I find these kits very helpful to keep the original equipment looking new.

reviews.title: I have control of my controller!
reviews.text: It is a dark navy blue with silvery grey pattern on the front. Attractive. The headphone and chat combo can be hooked up with a standard 3.5mm stereo jack. This is a nice controller that gives you some comfort in your hands with the diamond rubberized back. The player buttons are nice looking too. It connects to your pc, tablet or Xbox via Bluetooth connectivity and doing the hook up is a walk in the park. The controller also has custom mapping. It is stylized with a military look - hence the Patrol Tech design. I know some people who are going to have controller envy.

reviews.title: No One Touch My Personal Fav Controller
reviews.text: OMG! The volcano shadow controller is gorgeous. It is a nice red fade to black color. It is wireless so that you can connect via Bluetooth to your tablet, your pc or your Xbox One system. It is easy to connect to any of the devices. It also has a 3.5mm jack for you headset/chat headphone. The buttons are customizable and the back of the grip has a diamond pattern to give you an easier grip. I have to give props just for the Volcano shadow special edition controller. It is top notch and I am going to claim this baby as my own personal controller.

reviews.title: I don't like how these fit
reviews.text: With the charging cord, I easily connected and downloaded the updates, as suggested. In fact, I don't like the fit at all. The fit is just all wrong around my ears. I do wear glasses, but that did not factor into the fit. It is the earphone itself. The cushioned ear pad does not fit closely enough to cancel outside noises and it is irritating feeling the gaps. Oh, by the way, if you want to hear through these on your pc, you have to get a special adapter. I have other headphones for my pc and will use them for the pc.

reviews.title: I am loving this game

reviews.title: ... are a gamer and you want to play your best, you need to have a controller that won't ...

reviews.title: what do you do when you are traveling and don't have a power outlet?
reviews.text: Some games will use 2.5 hours before the battery needs charging, others might last the full 6 hours. So, if you are on the go and your battery dies, this handy dandy charging battery pack will work wonders. If you want to charge it faster and to the fullest capacity, it will need the switch off and about 4 hours of non stop charging. This charging battery pack has a kickstand so you can continue your play while charging. There are also lights to display when you need to charge and the power level. You can charge via a usb connector to an outlet, a computer or a vehicle usb slot.

reviews.title: wired, multi color changing controller

reviews.title: Holds my console just great and the hub works
