reviews.title: Decent Budget Set
reviews.text: this inexpensive headset gets the job done. the color is bright and fun for kids. It is fairly unisex; no one will object to it being either too masculine or feminine. sound quality is adequate though not extraordinary. It fits a variety of head sizes, a definite plus. that being said the headphones are not comfortable. I have a strong preference for over the earphones. These are on the ear. They are bearable but not my favorites. I would prefer a longer cord. This is a decent set for the price point. If you are looking for a stellar experience you can spend a lot more.

reviews.title: good But Not Great
reviews.text: These are attractive headphones that are reasonably comfortable. the sound is good but not exceptional. The mike is quite sensitive, not always a good thing. The biggest complaint I have is with respect to the volume. II does not really get as loud as I would like. Similarly, the PC software is clunky. Took me a while to get things going, not a big deal but at this price point, I do expect pretty near flawless. still a sturdy, functional headset. Buy when on sale.

reviews.title: Basic But Good
reviews.text: we go through headphones at an alarming rate and frankly I prefer not to break the bank on them. These headphones are basic but more than adequate in terms of comfort, sound quality and usability. The padding is thick and ears do get hot and sweaty. sound quality is surprisingly good and the mike is adequate. I've had no issues with interference or static. I like the basic black. Overall a good budget set.

reviews.title: Comfortable and Decent Sound
reviews.text: these are decent headphones. They are compatible with a number of systems.s sounds quality is good. The mic works well and they are lightweight and comfortable. the controls are simple and straightforward. My household goes through headphones at an alarming rate and I am loathe to spend big bucks on any. these are a good option that work well, are durable and don't break the bank.

reviews.title: A Winner
reviews.text: Finally, a wireless gaming mouse that equals the performance of a wired one. this mouse is fast. The estimated battery life is an impressive fifty hours. This seems accurate and it charges via any Qi-enabled surface. The lights and buttons are programmable. The finger rests are removable and the mouse is ambidextrous. It takes some playing around to find what conformation suits you best. Dedicated gamers will find the eleven different buttons useful; I found them gratuitous. My brothers however are and absolutely adored this mouse. It is a pricey proposition especially if you spring for the related mousepad. But the convenience of fewer cables and superior performance makes this a winner.

reviews.title: All Around Disappointment
reviews.text: I could not get this to work on either setting. With  the bluetooth it just blinked a d never connected. No problem with other devices. My computer would not recognize it. Downloading the driver was not simpke. You have to download their Synapse 2 program. I just wantd a driver. The black plastic looks and feels cheap. I do like that the battery is on the top. Disappointing experience.

reviews.title: Okay Mouse
reviews.text: The mouse itself is fine. It looks sharp and is comfortable and responsive. But if you want to customize it you must register and download a whole package. It is just a mouse and the level of intrusion is not justified. If you don't mind forgoing the customization or don't care about surrendering your privacy the mouse works decently and is good for gaming.

reviews.title: Well Made
reviews.text: Large and thin this mousepad provides a smooth surface. The rubberized base really holds. The fabric topper is waterproof. My mouse glides smoothly and seems more accurate. It is almost the same size as an average sheet of paper. It is thin enough to transport easily. So far I am pleased with it. It is well made with stitched edges so I anticipate it will last longer than most. Nice pad.

reviews.title: All About the Bass
reviews.text: This headset is comfortable. The vibration and bass are good and overall sound quality is better than expected. The noise cancellation is better than expected snd the mic works well. It does not connect to the controller, it connects to the system  A CD is included or you can download the needed software and drivers. It fits snugly but is comfortable. The controls are on the earpiece and it takes time to get accustomed to them. Overall it looks cool and performs decently.

reviews.title: Love the Rainbow Lights
reviews.text: This is a great mechanical keyboard. it is responsive and performs well. Set up was simple and I have had no performance issues. My favourite feature is the rainbow backlighting; very cool. It is good for gaming and also works well for regular use. It is sturdy and doesn't slip and slide. Good value.

reviews.title: Good Sound
reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent. There is a detachable mike that works quite well. The headset itself is quite comfortable although  I wish there was more padding and give on the ear cups. no problems with them on a PC. The noise cancellation is adequate. The controls are easy to use. I f you are a hardcore gamer you might want to go for something more advanced. But if you need a decent, affordable pair of headphones that you can game with as well as perform other functions, this set is a good choice.

reviews.title: Great mouse, but only lasted me about a year.
reviews.text:
Not a verified purchase because this was gifted to me a little over a year ago. This mouse has been my favorite mouse I've ever owned, but sadly the right click now malfunctions and clicks repeatedly on press. I would definitely recommend this mouse to anyone interested in something customizable and reliable. Just beware the hardware issues.

The software is easy to use and set up custom macros and keybinds with.

Perhaps the build quality could be a bit better. I took it apart for cleaning and it seems pretty flimsy and cheap.

reviews.title: Feels fantastic!
reviews.text: CUE software constantly forgets my button remappings (STILL!!). Super frustrating, I really regret this purchase. My thumb nail constantly gets caught on the plate above the side buttons. It's actually pretty lightweight and on the smaller side compared to my Steel Series Sensei 310. I think there's an issue with the surface calibration because sometimes my cursor just shoots off into a random direction.

reviews.title: About what you'd expect for the price.
reviews.text:
I really do not think this will protect my Switch if it takes a fall, but it gives it a nice grip when I hold it and does look nice. The screen protector is really nice. Very easy to apply and is probably better quality than the one I had previously.

For the price, though, this is definitely worth it.

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.text: Works great. Hasn't fallen apart. Feels like a good quality built item. Love it.

reviews.title: I think I got a second-hand case?
reviews.text:
It's not a huge deal but it does bug me seeing the black bars on the sides off-centered. It's also kind of sticky for some reason? I've been wiping it down often to try to help.

The screen protector is nice and fits fine, as do the little thumb grips which are really cute. I also like the micro fiber cloth.

For the price I think this is a fair deal, as it is really cute regardless of the small issues. I've done worse with a bigger case I used to have on my console lol.

reviews.title: Unbearable input delay and poor quality
reviews.text:
The video output was atrocious and the Genki program's UI is awful, but I guess it's very simplistic so it's easy to use. There's no way to configure any type of setting aside from "performance/resolution" modes, which seem to do almost nothing. I was honestly really looking forward to this but I can't even play a basic RPG game without getting frustrated. Moving the joystick takes a significant amount of time for the character to turn. I took my Switch out of the dock and I couldn't believe how different the game felt.

Save your money and just invest it into a better capture card.

reviews.title: Eh.
reviews.text: Overhyped. 10000% not worth full price. Outsourced to a no-name company and it really shows. It has some nice qualities, but honestly if you can just find this used/half-price, I'd say grab it - but anything over half price is an actual scam.

reviews.title: Kids love it!
reviews.text: My boys play this game for hours and hours. One prefers to play serious games, while the other actually spends hours creating characters and teams. He loves how much customization goes into that part!

reviews.title: The only video game you need from now on.
reviews.text: Can't say enough amazing things about this game. My 8 year old, 10 year old, husband, 25 year old brother and basically anyone else that walks into our home plays this game. It's amazing that they can connect with buddies on rainy days - a Minecraft playdate. I love the creativity in 'creative' mode. We tend to stay away from survival mode for the most part, and still have countless hours of fun time with this game.

reviews.title: Never get tired of this one!
reviews.text: Of all the sports games my kids have, I think they've spent the most time on this one. My younger son (8) loves creating players - giving them funky colored uniforms and hairstyles, then having them drafted onto a team. My older son (10) enjoys actually playing the game - and seems to think it's improving his actual real life ball skills. :)

reviews.title: A Favorite at Our House
reviews.text: My sons, 8 and 10, love to play this game - my 8 year old moreso than my 10 year old, but he's the video game fiend at our house anyhow. Love games that are fun for only ONE player, to avoid fights when both kids play at once. It's easy to find a stopping point, which means mom and dad don't have to wait twenty minutes for them to find a saving point.

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.text:
To be honest, I bought the game because there is a clown on the cover. I love clowns.
The game is really good, kept me occupied for a few hours.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.text:
I liked this game, the instructions were clear and the seek and find could be rather difficult.
The background is pretty interesting, Poe is about to be dragged down to the underworld unless you find the murderers of both Mary Rogers/Marie Roget and Poe. When you are playing the game, be sure to click on all the ravens you see.
It is a fun game, and you really can't go wrong with a $0.99 download.

reviews.text: The game is great! Just be aware that windows 10 will most likely not be able to play this game.

reviews.title: Four Stars
reviews.text:
Game arrived in good quality, will give 5 stars after playing the game.
Update: The home screen says "Calling All Units" but it is just the standard edition. Otherwise a great game. Easy to get started and figure out. I kinda like this better than Forza Horizon 3 just because it is not as in depth when it comes to car tuning.
Update2: Game keeps on dropping off due to connection issues.

reviews.title: Great alternative to the $50 controller
reviews.text: Great alternative to the $50 controller. Feels great in your hand. My only complaint is that the vibration sounds like a siren.

reviews.title: Really fun game for all ages
reviews.text: Really fun game for all ages. Puzzles are fun to figure out. I love that you get 2 games in one. Oh and I forgot, I'm playing this Xbox 360 game on the Xbox one!!! It's awesome! !

reviews.title: Works as advertised.
reviews.text: Works great! Batteries last a while. I switch them about twice a month (not a hard core gamer but I have my binge moments) I plug the charger into the back of the console.

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.text: Fun game for my wife and I. The puzzles are fun and new. I like how you can switch between any character in the game during freeplay. Also the Finn minifigure was a nice touch (deluxe version)

reviews.title: Really long game, but fun!
reviews.text: Fun game, been playing for 50 hours and still haven't finished the game!

reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Headset!
reviews.text: We got this headset for our son, 15, who is big into gaming and he absolutely loves this headset. The comfort, noise-cancelling, and sound quality is top notch! He really enjoys the adjustability and the comfort, along with the noise cancelling. He can also still hear us if we need his attention and that is a big plus for us! I would definitely buy this set again and recommend it to anyone looking for a really great gaming headset, especially at this price. Hope this review is helpful! !

reviews.title: Outstanding VR Cable
reviews.text: This VR cable is absolutely an excellent problem solver when it comes to gaming PC with your Oculus 2. The  right angle C is great, I love right angle cables because what I have noticed is that there is less tear and fraying accidentally because the actual cable is never having to manually be bent for accommodating odd angles. The length of this cable makes it great for the added PC gamin experience with your VR because you are able to set good boundaries to prevent accidents. Hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: Hidden Little Gem of a Gaming Headset
reviews.text: Okay, I will start this by saying we have tried SEVERAL different gaming headsets at several different price points, and by far, this is THE best gaming headset we have used. The sound quality and noise cancelling is absolutely superb. The market of gaming headsets is vast and it can be quite frustrating trying to find just that right one that gives you all of the functions you are hoping for. Comes with a stand too, and just a beast of quality. Highly recommend and I hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: Works Better Than More Expensive Brands
reviews.text: We have gamers and so naturally, with that comes the added need for lots of gaming equipment, and headsets are essential. We have tried so many different ones, expensive, middle of the road and cheap ones. Top notch. Absolutely zero issues right out of the box, been using it for 3 months the battery life is phenomenal, the sound quality is excellent. Noise cancelling is great enough that it makes the gaming experience easier to get enthralled but not so ridiculous that if someone needs your attention you aren't able to hear them. Comfortable ear foams and headband. Absolutely recommend this headset, without question.

reviews.title: Perfect RGB Pad For Gamers
reviews.text: Bought this to try for our 15 & 11 yo gamers. They have their own gaming area, and this did not disappoint. They love the RGB and the range they have with mouse usage, what I LOVE is the wrist support. They are on the computer a lot, not just for gaming but for school too and I have less worry when they are able to follow ergonomic protocols to help try to prevent carpal tunnel. This a great gift idea for any computer gamer for sure. The price is very reasonable as well. Hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: Face Cooling Fan, Works Really Well
reviews.text: It does a really good job at eliminating the facial overheat that you get from the stock headset that comes with your Oculus. There will still be sweat obviously, because those more intensively active games are going to bring the workout with them, but with the combination of the fan and the cotton interface that helps absorb the sweat, it definitely makes it more user friendly without a doubt. For the price, this is a great deal and definitely one of those accessories that is absolutely worth getting. The comfort is important too, and you are not sacrificing any comfort with this fan cover head strap. I hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: It's GREAT!!
reviews.text: What can I say, this battery pack is impressive. Please keep in mind, the charge your Oculus keeps, and the charge the battery pack keeps will greatly depending on how involved the games are that you are playing, but having said that, this battery pack has lived up to what the company states it will. The strap is extremely comfortable and easy to set up. This would also be a great accessory to give as a gift to the other people you know who own an Oculus. Absolute five-star review that is well deserved. I hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.text: We've had these controllers for a few months now and using them daily in order for me to give a fair review and we are not displeased at all. They work great at converting from handheld to regular controller, zero lag or glitching when casting to the tv or the computer. Feels great in your hands just like the controller you are used to on the other gaming systems and the construction and price are really good. I definitely recommend for switch gamers who need to conversion when casting to the tv or computer. This controller has a long battery life and quick recharge as well, fits your standard console charging cables. I hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: They Work Great
reviews.text: Our oldest is 16 and he uses them the most, and he reports that they are very comfortable in your hands, no connectivity issues. The back paddles are really good for re-mapping the button selections so that you don't have to continue to go back and forth as much to the joy stick from the regular buttons and he seemed to really appreciate that feature and he has been using them for a few months and literally had nothing negative to say. For the price I would say these are a good direction to go in. I hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: LOVE This New XXL RGB Pad!
reviews.text: I already had an RGB black large gaming pad, but when I saw this one I really wanted to give it a try because of the galaxy background and colors and it when I received it, it did not disappoint. Was extremely easy to set up and install, easy to go through settings to find the light cycle I wanted, the material is strong and completely solid along with the trim stitching. Also, when I am taking pics of things that I make, this RGB gaming pad doubles as a nice backdrop for my photos and I love it. I hope this review is helpful!

reviews.title: Great Charging Dock
reviews.text: This charging dock, surprisingly, works absolutely perfect for our space and our Oculus. It's lightweight, yes, but sturdy and holds everything we need in the space that we have for our Oculus and no more having to lay it on our bar area for charging, because this dock provides a home for the Oculus as well. We have only had it a month but it is stable, sturdy and the charge ports work great! We get lots of daily use from the Oculus so it's a true testament that it holds up to the constant on again, off again replace and removal. I hope you find this review helpful!

reviews.title: Works Great!
reviews.text: This mechanical RGB keyboard works great and as good as can be expected. Easy installation, RGB flawless easy to change patterns there's not really anything constructively negative that I can say about the build of this keyboard. Would make a great gift for any gamer for sure. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this one again for the price. I hope you find this review helpful!

reviews.title: Perfect Silicone Covers
reviews.text: This set of silicone covers for the Oculus are a really great addition to our Oculus providing extra protection and the fit is exceptional. Very sturdy and well worth the price. They hold up great with our boys who are not easy on items like this which is what made us purchase this set because we just wanted the added protection. I would definitely buy this set again but also would like to add that this would be a great gift for anyone who owns an Oculus. I hope you find this review helpful!

reviews.title: My Favorite So Far
reviews.text: It is easy to set up the blue tooth, has great stability. The range is not horrible, works pretty comparable to other sets as far as that goes. The sound quality is fantastic though and the noise cancelling might work a bit too well. They are very comfortable on my head and ears, not too light and not too heavy. The RGB works great too, matches all of my other RGB gear. The buttons are easy to use, all of the input ports are solid, zero problems with them so far as well. Fast charging and they keep a very long charge too.

reviews.title: Great Replacement
reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement for the original strap because it accidentally snapped and broke. This head strap is every bit as good as the factory brand head strap and the price is very reasonable so if you are looking for a replacement, look no further. So far the strap installs and is just as comfortable and somewhat a bit more sturdy than the original. I hope you find this review helpful!

reviews.title: Love This Gaming Keyboard
reviews.text: If you are looking at this item, clearly you are in the market for a mechanical keyboard and this one is fantastic. He is huge into gaming so naturally, RGB is a very real part of our computers and accessories. We could have gotten a standard mechanical kb, but as I stated, the RGB sticks with his preferences and so far so good. They keys are very fluid, the keyboard is easy to install, it's durable and sturdy, just a really solid build. This one would make a great gift too for any gamer. I hope you find this review helpful!

reviews.title: Great For Advanced Saber Players
reviews.text: But as an advanced user, it's actually great. These grips are made with good quality foam and plastic, sturdy even. This will be a subjective way of playing that game because you will run across people who prefer to use the stick controllers over the individual handles and vice-versa, but me personally, I could play either way and depending on the song, I often do better on some of the faster songs with the stick versus the individual handles. Either way, this set is a solid good one and would make a good accessory gift to anyone who is all about Beat Saber or any of the other music beat games.

reviews.title: Really Like This Set
reviews.text: On some of the games I prefer the individual extension grips and on some of the other songs that are faster in Beat Saber, I do better with the joined stick handle grip. These are solid build, comfortable and the foam area makes it really comfortable to use for extended play. Sometimes we play for 2 hrs at a time and that's a long time to play a game like Beat Saber, but these handles make it easier to do that, especially if you are having a competition. Definitely worth the money and would make a good gift to an Oculus user who loves the Beat Saber type of games. I do hope you find this review helpful!

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.text: I've just started playing hidden object adventure games, and this is by far the best. The graphics are very good, the music is moody, and there is lots to do. Most hidden object games make you find meaningless objects over and over in scene after scene that all look relatively the same. Not Dreamland. Each hidden object scene is very unique in appearance, and makes sense in the theme of the place. And the puzzles far outnumber the hidden object searches, which in my book is great. Very unique in concept, design, and execution.

reviews.title: Actually Played it Twice
reviews.text: I found this one very entertaining. First of all, no HOG objects that weren't needed to perform some task. Second of all, no tasks that didn't have some purpose to further the storyline. My only complaint was that there were some pretty obvious pieces missing from the story at the beginning that would have made the ending much more logical. But all in all, a very nice game. The cut scenes were a bit "plastic" looking, but the game art was top notch. No puzzles were too hard, and you could skip any of them. Good game overall.

reviews.title: Too Bad This is the Last One!
reviews.text: This series of games is just top notch! The artwork, the intricacy of the tasks, the story as it unfolds. The games are neither too short or too long, neither too easy or too hard. I really enjoyed playing this one, and will certainly play it again, which I rarely do. It's just a pity there aren't more games in this series. Well worth the price.

reviews.title: In the End, I Remain Impressed
reviews.text:
Original Review:
Beautiful graphics, quirky gameplay. This is NOT why I play adventure type games. Once I figured that out, I was able to complete the mini-game pretty easily.

In closing, I have to explain that I used to play this type of game all the time back in the heyday of "real" adventure games (like Myst). How lazy I've become! What's left of the adventure genre of games is way easier, and you can almost always skip the mini-games.

reviews.title: Fine Quality Throughout
reviews.text: Beginning with the awesome graphics, and ending with a well thought out storyline, this game is a joy to play. Just the right mix of tasks, puzzles, and HO scenes, it moved at a very nice pace. And it was far longer than most games of this type. Highly recommend this one!

reviews.title: Just Not That Great
reviews.text:
But the story is so choppy, and there is no real feel for what you are supposed to be doing. The puzzles are too repetitive in nature, and I ended up skipping many of them because they were just too boring.
If you are a fan of HO scenes, you will love this game, because there are A LOT of them, and they are nicely drawn. But I personally detest hunting for a bunch of useless objects over and over again just to gain one thing I need.
The artwork was nice, but just not enough to make the game worth it.

reviews.title: Great Game, Jam Packed
reviews.text: Wow, this really is a great deal at under $9 and free shipping. This game is jam packed with great graphics, lots of mini-games (puzzles), and beautiful HO scenes. As the game progresses, you need objects from inventory to complete the HO scenes, which makes them a lot more interesting. The story is interesting, with lots of cut scenes. And the game is LONG, including an extra smaller game at the end of the main game. There are even bonus mini games that you unlock by collecting flowers in each scene of the main and extra games.

reviews.title: Thoroughly Enjoyable
reviews.text: Lovely graphics, quirky storyline, nice music, great variety of puzzles and HO scenes. I really had no complaints about this game at all. It was nice and long, with lots of different rooms to explore. I loved the different versions of the rooms, and the transporting effects. As a matter of fact, even the little details like the effects when you locate an object or complete a task were so well designed. A really great game, and worth a few extra bucks.

reviews.title: Fabulous!
reviews.text: I loved every aspect of this game. Great variety of puzzles, too, and none of them too awfully hard. Lots of having to move objects around to accomplish tasks. The storyline flowed very well, and the length of the game was good too. I can't say enough about the graphics - this game is extremely artistic. Even the HOG scenes were well thought out, with quite a few objects that had to be pieced together, or the need to find objects inside other objects (like chests, drawers, even paintings). I even loved the music! Well worth the price.

reviews.title: One of My Favorites
reviews.text: Wow, this game is truly wonderful. Artwork is great, concept is very inventive, lots and lots to do. I am playing a second time to get all the strawberries. It's really quite long, but I couldn't tear myself away from the computer, so i finished it in a few sessions. Lots and lots of artistic detail in this one, puzzles are varied and different, story line is quite unique (if you like fantasy), music is lovely.

reviews.title: More Puzzles than HO Scenes - Fun Overall
reviews.text: The graphics are wonderful, and the puzzles are mostly fun, but I skipped a bunch of them because the instructions just didn't make sense to me. Overall, an enjoyable, if short, gaming experience. The HO scenes are more interesting because there are many objects you need to combine first. The story is interesting, and the video sequences are well done. I enjoyed collecting the flowers and money and bulding my garden. It was a nice addition to the game play. My biggest complaint is that it was far too short for me - finished it over 2 days, and not too many hours.

reviews.title: Fun Game
reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game. A nice variety of puzzles, and I didn't even mind the HO scenes because you were gathering items you actually needed. The story was interesting, and the graphics and cut scenes were top notch. My biggest complaint was the ending, which was way too abrupt, and felt like they just ran short of funds.... Still, a good 5 hours of gaming, which is okay by me.

reviews.title: Nice but Short
reviews.text: Not your usual game, very unique graphics and storyline. I really enjoyed playing it, but it was way too short for my taste.

reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time
reviews.text: This was absolutely the worst game I have ever played. Tons of repetitive and boring HO scenes with the same items over and over again, no item manipulation or hidden items. A very loose story line consisting of characters telling you to do things for them that require you to visit those annoying HO scenes over and over again. The small number of mini games or puzzles were unoriginal and either too easy or impossible to determine what you needed to do. And the help consisted of highlighting the hot spots in the scene you were currently in. Unless you enjoy HO scenes and nothing else, steer clear of this one.

reviews.title: TOP NOTCH GAME PLAY!!!!
reviews.text: Absolutely everything about this game was awesome. Lots and lots of puzzles, beautiful graphic throughout, wonderful story line, great voices, a solid game progression that actually made sense. And it was LONG! Well worth the full price.

reviews.title: WOULD NOT DOWNLOAD
reviews.text: Tried multiple times. Downloaded another game, so it wasn't my system. Got a refund from Amazon.

reviews.title: A little costly for their size but my son loved opening these little Pikmin guys on Christmas morning
reviews.text: A little costly for their size but my son loved opening these little Pikmin guys on Christmas morning. Holding up well despite being tossed around.

reviews.title: Perfect little gift for an Animal Crossing fan
reviews.text: So cute! Perfect little gift for an Animal Crossing fan. Can play as Tom on Mario Maker which made my son's day!

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Fun! My 9 year old loves to make his own boards.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: Work well, we will see how long they last.

reviews.title: My favorite stylis I love how they fold down
reviews.text: My favorite stylis I love how they fold down. Fit in my 3ds and are well made. Great price too!

reviews.title: Joy Con Charger
reviews.text: Nice. I like the indicators. Seems to charge well.

reviews.title: Luigi Mansion 3
reviews.text: I really like it.

reviews.title: Nintendo Switch Pro Controller
reviews.text: Sweet. Buttons a little larger than the joy cons. I like it.

reviews.title: Nintendo Joy-Con (L/R) - Gray
reviews.text: Just like the ones that came with it.

reviews.title: Could be better...
reviews.text: As opposed to the many other Pokemon games that came out I would have to rate this generation of pokemon as a whole at the bottom of the list. Your choices for pokemon are also limited in types. For instants you will mostly find Water and Grass type pokemon. And the new replacements for team Rocket, Aqua, etc, is are bunch of nerdy loosers known as Team Galactic. But the graphics, sound, animations were good, color too. However to the seasoned veterans that have been fans since gameboy, I recommend you either wait for the remakes of silver and gold or get diamond or pearl if you must, they were better than platinum.

reviews.title: Nothing more than Hype
reviews.text: I got this game expeting exceleent things! But it wasnt all that. Its a game packed with a bunch of level that are no more than about a minute long, or as little as about 5 seconds (literaly). Whats more your creations will turn on you! So watch out. But seriously, for something that is so supposed to be so complex, you will be shocked by its sheer simplicity. Which is to say that this game was a bit of a dissapointment.

reviews.title: Gravely Dissapointing TW fans Beware!
reviews.text: This game is terrible! The action is little, and its not like TW at all! So anyone who plays TW do not buy! Even Empires was better than this trash!

reviews.title: Really good game for the money!
reviews.text: Okay, I will try to make this sweet and simple. This game is really a fun game. They are actually smart! You have the ability to use your knife to kill them! Weapons look cool, scenery is decent, action is good, on the level of the original Killzone. Pretty good overall and for this price you just cant beat it. VERY CHALLENGING GAME! Whats cool is you fight a lot of dinosaurs but also have a lot of gun fights!

reviews.title: Buggy! Vista users Beware, will not launch game!
reviews.text: The fun factor is 9/10 for sure for me, and I beat the game 4 times. The PC version is not user friendly in the least! You will be able to install your game but unable to play it on vista! I have checked around on 7 different sites, no one can give a straight answer to the problem! But from time to time throwing grenades can also trigger it. Choosing your path is a bit too straight forward it seems, but all and all it is a fun game. Comparing it to games today it still gets a fairly decent score in the fun department.

reviews.title: One of the Greatest games of all time!
reviews.text: Title says it all! You can run the campaign as you see fit! Raise mighty armies to crush your foes! You start with the 3 roman families, Julii, Scipii, and Brutii. Not only that but you can mod the game so you can play as whatever faction you want and when that's not enough you can take the fight to your friends online or play tag team battles! Swords, Axes, Spears, Bows, Arrows, Siege Gear, Horse Archers, Elephants, you will finally have your chance to cease complete control through TOTAL WAR!

reviews.title: Pros & Cons review
reviews.text: You get most of the most reputable guns of the cold war and even some rarely seen and unique ones! The main reason I think people are dissapointed in this game is the same reason for most games/movies of this league.....OVER HYPE! Some people who gave this game a horrid rating do not have an open mind either to this style of gameplay or the reality of the design of this game. If you like going solo go for Call of Duty 1,2,3, and World at War and maybe Call of Duty 4. And yes SCAR lovers I do feel your pain too.

reviews.title: WOW!
reviews.text: I love this little system. Just got  it in the mail  today and  mmaaaaaan it is so fun. I only have Lego Star Wars for it right now but the 3D effect is awesome and the screen is so freaking big. The colors are great and when you actually see this in person you'll know what I mean. The blue on the system has a pretty metallic look. The weight isn't too bad but I am using it more for at home and in the car. But  this system is fantastic and the games out and coming out for it still are good. Its worth the buy. Enjoy and happy gaming!

reviews.title: Pretty Darn Good
reviews.text: Make sure you only play this game when you have plenty of free time. You can play Arcades, use computers and such  to find jobs, chat with other sims, or go to the boardwalk and learn to play the guitar. Overall its pretty darn fun on long road trips or just relaxing in the bedroom and play. This game can be fun for all ages so long as children can read and understand financial stuff like your mortgage or rent. In  those cases this game is very addictive. Hope this review helps somebody out.

reviews.title: Total Letdown!
reviews.text: Empires Total War is better than this garbage and that says a lot! Its horrid! But after several siege battles they  look nothing like the Siege of Carthage trailer portrays it to look like. Options for this  game are very limited. The AI ALWAYS tries to screw you and sometimes its impossible to even get trade rights (which is crazy). The whole thing is  SOOOO slow. The wait time in between turns are also insanely long. Look, I own ALL the Total War  titles and I can say this  was the worst and the biggest let down. Its corny as hell. till then have fun with the other titles in the series.

reviews.title: Don't Listen To The Haters
reviews.text: The pulse rifle is straight from the movies and is the same model of rifle as was seen in the original Alien movie and follow up in the Prequel Aliens. The smart disc is probably my favorite weapon. But you have limited uses so make shots count and be a true hunter. I must admit I enjoyed the creep factor and darkness of the Marine campaign a lot. Stealth kills truly are fun! truly the original sounds from the movies and creepy as hell at times! Tons of fun and challenging, super intense. Major creep factor to keep you on your toes, excellent action, and all the essential weapons as well from the movies.

reviews.title: Game on!
reviews.text: Nice form factor for mobile gaming. The white handles do not mark easily which was a concern for me. A screen protector is a must for me and a buyer should consider getting the largest memory card they can afford to go with it.

reviews.title: Protects the screen
reviews.text: Easy application. No more fingerprints on the screen, no more scratches.

reviews.title: Takes less room than Nintendo stand
reviews.text: However, connection can be somewhat unreliable, possible loose connection inside. The Switch needs better support to guide the connector into it's slot like the cone shaped guides in the Nontendo stand.

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.text: Bought for N. Switch gaming. This controller is quality, modelled on the old playstation 2/3 platform and is sturdy and well made. No lag with joysticks or buttons. Additional connection available for PC/steam/android - so versatile.

reviews.title: Great Workout
reviews.text: If you're a MJ fan, then this is the perfect game for you. Interesting enough it wasn't hard to follow the moves from the pictograms or even MJ himself because they depicted his signature moves. Training and warm/up videos should have been a feature that is available to the user before they begin attempting the dance moves and not something that the user gets after he has attempted the dance moves. But, I couldn't in good conscience give this game the full five stars because of the problems with game usability. The realism and fun of the songs and dance moves are a solid 6 stars but the usability is a only worthy of 2 stars.

reviews.title: Pass on this one...
reviews.text: These straps didn’t work on my Oculus Touch controllers. They aren’t thick enough to stay in the opening and kept falling out. I returned them.

reviews.title: Exactly as advertised...
reviews.text: I love these controller covers. They are comfortable in your hands and make holding on to the controllers a lot easier.

reviews.title: Exactly as advertised...
reviews.text: This lens protector is really nice. It fits snugly and provides great padding for protecting the lens.

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed and wanted.
reviews.text: Came beautiful and clear of any screen issues. Runs like a champ just like it should. Love it, and I recommend everyone who wants to bring back the nostalgia of their childhood back to get this. Couldn't be more happy.

reviews.title: For your charging needs.
reviews.text: Does exactly what it should do for a pretty decent price. Not much more to say other than it is what it is- a great charger.

reviews.title: For your charging needs.
reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to, charges very quickly and does a great job of it. If you need a charger for your Advance or Advance SP, this should be exactly what you need.

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.text: Fits on perfectly, is stable and durable feeling, and is exactly how it is advertised. Probably the most comfortable 3DS grip on the market, certainly well worth the price. Not to mention it literally got here in 2 days with standard shipping estimating 6-8 days from the day I actually got it.

reviews.title: Works like a charm.
reviews.text: It fits perfectly on  my 3DS XL, it was very easy to put on but stays on very well. Sturdy and helps prevents scratches, duh, and looks pretty cool. All I can say bad about this is that a few of the edges are a little sharp, but that is nothing that some sand paper and black spray paint can't fix.

reviews.title: Stands out from the croud
reviews.text: I've been using this headset more or less exclusively for the past few months, from listening to/editing music and videos, to playing video games such as CS:GO, Battlefield 4 & Hardline, Arma II and III, GTA V, Skyrim, etc. I've used a multitude of comparable headsets over the years, SteelSeries, Logitechs, Turtle Beaches, Razers, pretty much anything I could get my hands on for under $200.

reviews.title: Definitely recommend it for this price ($19
reviews.text: What can I say other than it works flawlessly? I use it for both Dolphin Emulator and legit Gamecube purposes, it hasn't let me down. Definitely recommend it for this price ($19.95 w/ free shipping at time of purchase)

reviews.title: Mayflash GC Controller Adapter for PC and Wii U
reviews.text: Works exactly how it should, useful for both the Wii U and PC, all four ports work perfectly. Not much else to be said here, product just works as it should at a good price.

reviews.title: Wielder of the Schwarz Sechs Prototype MkII.
reviews.text: Rikka Takanashi is one of those characters that sticks in your mind, for one reason or another. I lost a lot of family members earlier in life too, and responded in a somewhat similar way as she did. The build and art quality are both phenomenal. It's certainly sturdy, feels like nothing would happen if there were to be an accident involving a shelf, an elbow, some force, and a fall to the ground. Definitely recommend Sega products, I have a few more on the way, and already received two, the other being Chino from Is The Order A Rabbit?

reviews.title: Great mouse, iffy middle button
reviews.text: Amazing mouse. Only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is the middle mouse button which can be finicky. I thought I was going to have to buy another when it became hard to get it to click without pressing very hard, but thankfully it went back to normal. Seems to be a consistent problem with this mouse among many users.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.text: Low volume, extreme static.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: Only downside is the wiring for the cameras, everything else has an edge over the Vive.

reviews.title: Awesome game, not for the impatient
reviews.text: Give a chance and get to Chapter 3 at least before judging it, you sad sacks.

reviews.title: Solid replacement for the G602
reviews.text: The software isn't that bad, once you get the hang of it.

reviews.title: Nephews love the game
reviews.text:
As expected. Lots of enjoyment!
Arrived packaged securely. Very happy with purchase. Christmas gift.

reviews.title: Great Silicone Grips!
reviews.text: I purchased this over a year ago & the quality for what I paid exceeded my expectations. My Son has changed controllers a long the way but these anti- slip grips have remained of great quality all this time. I was reluctant because the price was so cheap but after some adjustment my Son felt he had his controller more in tact & ultimately games better. The silicone is nice & flexible. Easy to adjust & take off when necessary. He has enjoyed the comfort in holding his controller now. For the cost & benefit I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Not of good quality
reviews.text: My Son had this gaming headset & within 2 weeks the sound began to go. It began with crackling & then one side went out totally. I do not recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.text: PS4 Charging Cable for intended use. Boxed well & ready to use. No disappointment. Good price. 5 star 100%!

reviews.title: Extremely easy & convenient!
reviews.text: I forgot to purchase a PlayStation gift card for my Son’s stocking. I realized Amazon sold these digital gift cards. I placed the order & in less than 1 minute had the PlayStation code he would need. I took a screenshot of it, printed it & placed it in his stocking! So easy!! Love that Amazon offers this! !

reviews.title: Will not load
reviews.text: We’ve tried multiple times to load this on our Son’s PS4 console. It begins to load & stops again & again. It’s not the console as another PS4 game was recently loaded. This disk is defective.

reviews.title: Fast & easy access to a gift card!
reviews.text: I purchased this digital version of a PlayStation gift card for my Son who was eager to have funds for a game he was playing. I placed the order & within less than a minute I had the PlayStation gift card code sent to my email. I was amazed!! I definitely recommend if you want the funds now rather than later!! Plus I purchased it at the convenience in my own home. Such an asset Amazon offers! Absolutely recommend! !

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.text: I bought this game for my 4 yr old daughter for her birthday. When I asked her to review it (and of course had to explain the word at first) she said "I love that game". It is short and mostly uncomplicated for younger users. I had to help her to design her character at the beginning and sometimes she had some troubles moving it around the game but she absolutely loved it. Truly meant for an optimistic princess.

reviews.title: It's a skylander "I" did not previously have.
reviews.text: Purchased these for my kids, it is one they didn't yet have. What more can be said? They love the game and enjoyed getting a new character to play with. The product arrived on or before the e.t.a. and was in new condition (as described by seller).

reviews.title: Works Great.
reviews.text: Love the pop-up feature, think it made it last longer than some of the other dual charging stations I have purchased in the past. Will probably purchase again if or when it breaks (I have small children and consider broken items more of an inevitability than some). But this has lasted much longer than I expected already! I was surprised, when I first saw the picture I thought it would be much more cheaply made. Pleasantly surprised.

reviews.title: Didn't have it.  Now I do.
reviews.text: What more can be said?

reviews.title: Flawed, but adequate....
reviews.text:
BAD:

The memory card manager corrupted my memory card and destroyed saves. It takes a long time for the disk to load, and like most cheat devices many codes don't work and it also causes freezing quite often. Also, the ability to download codes and gamesaves is pretty cool.

Over all this is a decent buy, but I would probably be happier with a Codebreaker or the newer USB AR MAX.

reviews.title: Best online shooter on PS2.
reviews.text:
For anyone that has played the first Socom game, don't expect "Socom 1 with new maps." The game is lots of fun and is probably the best online shooter for PS2.

BAD:

There are a lot of bugs in the game. Hit detection and lag are really bad, so it is common for your shots not to register. It is now a greatest hit and only $20.00 new....I would pay that just for the offline portion!!

reviews.title: This game is a blast...
reviews.text:
I'm not a Star Wars fan, but this game is so much fun. The levels are creative and the "capture the base" style play keeps respawn play strategic. It's hard to find a game with a friend, or any specific room at all. Also, some of the blaster guns trail way behind your crosshairs and this gets annoying. As with any online shooter there are occasional teamkillers.

If you like first person shooters and/or Star Wars than get this game. It seems that Lucas Arts is releasing online patches quite often to fix all the problems in this game.

reviews.title: Made for giants...
reviews.text:
This mouse is great for the price, and is very customizable. This mouse requires you to name a function for the buttons in it's own software.

Something that I didn't like about this mouse is that the lighting is changeable on the buttons, but the mouse wheel always glows yellow. It's an eyesore.

One thing that I really like is the multiple profiles that are switchable on the fly. For example, I might use a profile with a fast mouse speed for a run and gun shooter, and simply hit a button to slow the mouse speed when I'm sniping.

reviews.title: best trivia game
reviews.text:
great game cant wait for part 2.
4 player fun. They should add into the 2nd level of difficulty questions more questions.
easiest game to get involved in for novices of video games.
great for all ages.

reviews.title: highly disappointed
reviews.text:
its more of the same that i seen since civ4.
also having to buy the piece by piece addons are a rip.

reviews.title: no franchise mode
reviews.text: poor product not well thought out. riding on success of previous franchise. i need to check review next time before i buy this product.

reviews.title: there is a live side window practice preview of each mini game before you start the mini game.
reviews.text:
Its more of the same type of fun minigames but updated for the Nintendo Switch with some twists.
This is great for local group games with friends and family.
Would recommend for all ages - kids and adults alike.
If you are a fan of previous Mario Party editions, you will like this one.

Con: Due to the mini game gameplay style, It does not support the switch pro controller or handheld mode. Understandable due to the nature
of many of the motion controls, shaking of the controller required in the mini games.

reviews.title: Nice accessory to the switch controller!
reviews.text:
Gaming on the switch controller, I get tired after some time. Using this easy to hold accessory reduces finger cramps and enables me to comfortably game longer without cramping!

Very helpful is the notch on the bottom to easily remove the controller for charging. There's 2 rubber stops to keep the controller in place. Great product!

reviews.title: Wireless decent quality similar in size to my xbox series x controllers
reviews.text: This is a decent mid-tiered quality switch controller that provides turbo for a lot of the smashing type or wrestling games. I initial thought it was small from the pictures but upon receiving it, its actually the same size as my xbox series x controller. Compared to xbox and switch pro controller its buttons and joysticks are a bit softer but not by much and this is a great value with great looks! Didnt see link to manual so I took picture of the manual.

reviews.title: Pictured next to a Deathadder, its a quality product
reviews.text:
Subtle rainbow leds on the bottom adds warmth at night.
If you owned a Deathadder before it performs similarly in feel and tactile response.
Even the mouse wire is similarly in that its soft and flexible.
I have large sized hands and this feels right at home.

The feet could have more teflon surface area but still good.
Didn't need software for it to work outright out of the box and its adjustable in Windows.
You can adjust the pointer speed from the 2 middle buttons below the scroll wheel.
This is a decent gaming RBG mouse.

reviews.title: Value MMO mouse
reviews.text:
I use this to play MMO games. Even though it has less side MMO buttons 2X4 vs 3X4 configurations its seems easier to use without the middle button. There a nice thumb rest on the side that others dont have but it feels for my large hand there's nothing to rest my pinky finger on.
Also scroll wheel doesnt click left to right but thats more so for spreadsheets.
By default without software it works right out the box with pleasant pulsating rgb lights.
Its a good mouse nevertheless.

reviews.title: One of the better jigglers out there
reviews.text:
At first I was hesitant as some of these jigglers identify themselves in device manager as mouse jiggler which is a dead ringer giveaway. I have mine set as the 3rd option which moves in a square pixel pattern. I also like that it remembers my last setting used when I turn it off.
I had to take off one star as it did not come with an usb c converter as advertised.
Aside from that minor issue, this works very well.

reviews.title: forward & back buttons are reversed by default
reviews.text: This mouse works nicely for the price. However the default buttons for forward and backward is reversed. I tested this on another computer just to be sure. Not sure if this is designed by as such or if it was a defect. Also did not like the visible screws showing on the underside of the mouse as it potentially can cause scratches.

reviews.title: Four Stars
reviews.text: Pretty cheap but so is the price.

reviews.title: Two controllers, two bad D-Pads
reviews.text: ...and now I can't return this one.

reviews.title: Solid.
reviews.text: Would get 5 stars if the spot in the back held more than 2 batteries but it does the thing.

reviews.title: Wireless and solid.
reviews.text: This controller is perfect for PC gaming. If you are on Widows 10 you don't even need drivers for it, it just goes.

reviews.title: The best wireless option but...
reviews.text: All the weird buttons by the thumb are too much, just make a wireless version of the G502.

reviews.title: awesome!
reviews.text: it's just... awesome!

reviews.text: kids love it!

reviews.title: great game
reviews.text: believe it or not, woman like shoot em up games too. this is a nice one. the best game ever for me was black, but i can rate this one right up close to it. great game, in great condition and got here very fast. thanks amazon and sellers. :O)

reviews.title: christmas gift
reviews.text: this is gonna be a good christmas. this is for my son, he wanted it all year and i finally gave in, he just dont know that.

reviews.title: fun stuff
reviews.text: got this for my son, he has spent many hours on it and really enjoys it. some parts are easy and some are really hard but that is what is fun, makes a person think and really use thier heads to get thru it all. great game.

reviews.title: christmas gift
reviews.text: this was a gift for hubie on christmas 2011. he loved it. its fun to watch a grown man swerve in his chair as he drives.

reviews.title: game collection
reviews.text: bought this to add to my collection. i now have over 200 games. its for my old age. nursing home security.

reviews.title: christmas gift
reviews.text: bought this for husband's ps3. he loved it, he is big steelers fan and he is proud to use it to play his game. great gift.

reviews.title: good game
reviews.text: I have the entire evil dead set thanks to this purchase. fun games, silly but yet interesting and sometimes difficult areas to get thru. great buy.

reviews.title: another choice
reviews.text: had to keep collection in tact. someone borrowed this from me and I never got it back so I found on amazon and ordered right away. great little game even if its old as dirt, lol

reviews.title: another collectors piece
reviews.text: another item for my evil dead collection. so glad I got them all. ps1 and ps2, just don't make new ones anymore. haha

reviews.title: pretty good.
reviews.text: I haven't played this game too much, I've been working on my other games, but from what I have played this game isn't too bad. It's different from other games I've played, but I do like it. This game, if bought new, comes with downloadable code for the first Alice game -- That game i really do not like. The controls are different, like camera angles, and the graphics are not very good.

reviews.title: Liked Kingdom hearts
reviews.text: I enjoyed playing the Kingdom Hearts game. It was my favorite. The other 2 games it comes with, not so much. I just couldn't get into those games. The first Kingdom hearts, although my favorite, did have some boring parts but it was much easier to get in to.

reviews.title: Yay! Best racing and car take down game!
reviews.text: I had nearly the entire burnout series on PS2 but this was by far my favorite game of the series. I couldn't find this for PS3 but since I had an Xbox 360 decided to get it. I really missed playing this game. I also miss how far I had gotten in ps2 since, you know having to start over again. Oh well, either way, it's a fun game. My favorite racing game where I get rewarded for driving like a maniac and taking down rival racers! :) their music selection sucks though so I had to turn that off while playing.

reviews.title: Favorite game ever!
reviews.text: This game is my favorite game I've ever played. It's actually pretty funny. This however is a truly rated M game. I finished the game but I am going to be starting it all over again, just because it's fun and funny.

reviews.title: It really sucks
reviews.text: I just started playing this game and it seriously sucks. This is more of a tablet game than a PS4 game. Smh. What a waste of money! Wasn't even able to capture the first ghost. I could move around but wasn't able to fire my weapon or heal the other team member. It's also very boring. I knew I should have bought something else :(

reviews.title: Not the game I paid for
reviews.text:
I ordered the XL rated M that included ALL characters and skin packs. What did I get? The little bit cheaper version that only included 9 additional characters and skins.

So disappointed! I paid the small additional price for the full version! Not the $27 version with only 9 additional characters. :(

It's still a good game. Just wish I got what I wanted and paid for. The photo of what I got was misleading. :(

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.text:
I’m still working on New Order before old blood but it seems Old Blood would be the first one? Either way it’s a pretty good game and I’m not much into shooter games! Lol. I normally try an easy setting before I up the difficulty just to get a feel for the game.

I have the VR set, and although this is not a VR game, the VR set allows me to play games while someone else is watching TV. I am so needing to try it since it becomes like a giant theater screen while playing.

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.text: I barely started playing this game and I’m not impressed so far. I only spent like 10-20 minuets with the game so far though.

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.text: This is my favorite VR game! I have a problem with feeling dizzy however, but still love this game! It’s super creepy and gives those jump scares.

reviews.title: Love GOW
reviews.text: The graphics are awesome, there is a new game+ that keeps all your saved skill upgrades and armor. There is even new armor as well. I think there is a special type of armor once you defeat some of the valkaries as well. I cannot wait for the next GOW to come out!
